TUTORIAL_1_DESCRIPTION.en: We're about to lose the beachhead!\nIt's up to you now, soldier!\nClick on the Infantry unit to select it.

TUTORIAL_2_DESCRIPTION.en: Move your infantry north next to the Enemy Unit!

TUTORIAL_3_DESCRIPTION.en: Click on the enemy and all adjacent units will fire on it!

TUTORIAL_5_DESCRIPTION.en: Get that wounded infantry unit fixed up! Click the Heal button in the bottom right.

TUTORIAL_6_DESCRIPTION.en: Good! Now click on the wounded unit to heal it. Healing require supplies. Luckily we've got enough for now!

TUTORIAL_7_DESCRIPTION.en: We're blind out there! Build a Watchtower to get some visibility on enemy movement! Click the Shop button on the top left corner of the screen.

TUTORIAL_8_DESCRIPTION.en: Set up that Watchtower near the northern border and let's see what the enemy is up to!

TUTORIAL_9_DESCRIPTION.en: It's imperative that you keep the supply machine rolling! Click on the Drop Zone to start new Supply production.

TUTORIAL_4_DESCRIPTION.en: In order to Heal our troops, we need Supplies! Click that Drop Zone to collect the Supplies that are ready.

TUTORIAL_10_DESCRIPTION.en: Outstanding work, soldier! You're ready for your first tactical missions. Click to view mission briefings on the left of the screen.

TUTORIAL_COLLECTSUPPLIES_DESC.en: We got a supply drop on the drop zone, so collect them both!

TUTORIAL_GETSUPPLIES_DESC.en: Drop Zones bring in Supplies, which are used for repairs. We have a shipment coming in now!

MISSION_HINT_TEXT.en: HINT: Share your success and send Ally Reports to your allies. These Reports are needed for Fire Missions.

BRAGG_FRIEND_DESC.en: Thank you, Mrs. President. We have a situation escalating in my front as well!

MISSION_RANKPRIVATE_DESC.en: You're off to a good start, Recruit! Complete these goals and you'll earn a promotion to Private in no time.

MISSION_RANKPFC_DESC.en: Listen up, Private! You show great promise. Do well on this mission and you'll earn a promotion to Private First Class.

MISSION_RANKCORPORAL_DESC.en: Fine work, soldier! Complete these tasks and you'll never have latrine duty again!

MISSION_RANKSERGEANT_DESC.en: You're climbing the ranks quickly, Corporal! Achieve the following goals and you'll earn yourself another stripe!

MISSION_RANKSERGEANTMAJOR_DESC.en: You're well on your way to a promotion, Sergeant! Keep your head on straight and you'll make Sergeant Major soon enough.

MISSION_RANKCADET_DESC.en: You're a fine example, soldier! You're under review to become an Officer Cadet. Perform well and you'll begin Officer training.

MISSION_RANKSECONDLIEUTENANT_DESC.en: Good show, Cadet! It's time to prove that you're ready to become a Second Lieutenant.

MISSION_RANKLIEUTENANT_DESC.en: You're doing your nation proud, soldier! With a little more experience, you'll make a great Lieutenant!

MISSION_RANKCAPTAIN_DESC.en: You've got a glowing service record, Lieutenant! Keep it up and you'll earn a promotion to Captain!

MISSION_RANKMAJOR_DESC.en: Captain, your progress has been exemplary. You're well on your way to being promoted to Major.

MISSION_RANKLTCOLONEL_DESC.en: You wear the insignia well, Major. There are only a few tasks standing in between you and your promotion.

MISSION_RANKCOLONEL_DESC.en: You've building up quite a reputation, soldier! I have no doubt you'll be ready for a promotion to Colonel soon.

MISSION_RANKBRIGADIER_DESC.en: You've done me proud, soldier. Not long ago you were a snot-nosed recruit, and now you're almost ready to become a Brigadier General.

MISSION_RANKGENERAL_DESC.en: You've become a war hero! Mrs. President has contacted me on your behalf, recommending that you be made a General. There's just a few loose ends to tie up.

MISSION_RANKMARSHAL_DESC.en: Your outstanding service to your military and nation will go into the history books. You will soon step into my shoes as the new Marshal General of our army... right after you complete a few last goals.

MISSION_RANKPRIVATE_COMPLETION.en: Good job! For capturing enemy land, you have been promoted to Private!

MISSION_RANKPFC_COMPLETION.en: Outstanding! You have been promoted to Private First Class!

MISSION_RANKCORPORAL_COMPLETION.en: Well done, Corporal! You've taken back land that's rightfully ours!

MISSION_RANKSERGEANT_COMPLETION.en: Congratulations, you have truly earned your stripes, Sergeant!

MISSION_RANKSERGEANTMAJOR_COMPLETION.en: Good work! I am proud to promote you to Sergeant Major!

MISSION_RANKCADET_COMPLETION.en: Welcome to the officer's club, Cadet!

MISSION_RANKSECONDLIEUTENANT_COMPLETION.en: Congratulations, you have been promoted to Second Lieutenant!

MISSION_RANKLIEUTENANT_COMPLETION.en: Well done, you are hereby promoted to a Lieutenant!

MISSION_RANKCAPTAIN_COMPLETION.en: Attention, soldier! It is my honor to promote you to the rank of Captain!

MISSION_RANKMAJOR_COMPLETION.en: On this date, you are promoted to the rank of Major. Congratulations!

MISSION_RANKLTCOLONEL_COMPLETION.en: At ease, soldier! I am happy to tell you that you have been promoted to the rank of Lieutenant Colonel.

MISSION_RANKCOLONEL_COMPLETION.en: Your achievements have earned you a promotion to full Colonel!

MISSION_RANKGENERAL_COMPLETION.en: On behalf of our great nation, I am honored to hereby promote you to the rank of General.

MISSION_RANKMARSHAL_COMPLETION.en: It's time for me to pass the torch. I know that you will do great things for our country, Marshal General!

FIRE_MISSION_MORTAR_DESC.en: Call in a cheap and fast Mortar Strike that hits a small area

FIRE_MISSION_ARTILLERY_DESC.en: Call the howitzer boys to deliver some big bang on a wider area

FIRE_MISSION_NAPALM_DESC.en: The Air Corps deliver a horizontal napalm strike on a wider area

FIRE_MISSION_DOOMSDAY_DESC.en: The top secret HQ weapon devastates a huge area and can really turn the tide

HFE_PLOT_DESC.en: Produces supplies used for healing units.

HFE_PLOT_LONG_DESC.en: Use Drop Zones to receive Supples that are used for healing your Units.

HFE_FARM_DESC.en: Fast flying Air Corps deliver %U supplies by airdrop.

HFE_QUARRY_DESC.en: %U Supplies are delivered by the Air Corps.

HFE_SAWMILL_DESC.en: %U Supplies sent by the HQ via a scheduled Air Corps delivery.

HFE_OILWELL_DESC.en: %U Supplies sent straight from the HQ.

HFE_AREA1TOWN_DESC.en: The peaceful capital of the southern province famous for its warm climate and tourist attractions.\n\nSupport civilians with Supplies and they will reward you with money!

HFE_AREA2TOWN1_DESC.en: A large production powerhouse in the region, Westbay is crucial for the fishing industry and cargo transport business.\n\nSupport civilians with Supplies and they will reward you with money!

HFE_AREA2TOWN2_DESC.en: The bustling capital of the eastern coast, Eastport is an attractive tourist destination with it's long, sandy beaches and vibrant community.\n\nSupport civilians with Supplies and they will reward you with money!

HFE_AREA3TOWN_DESC.en: The largest city in the capital region, Metropol C.D is the seat of power for the whole area and its influences even extends across national borders.\n\nSupport civilians with Supplies and they will reward you with money!

HFE_AREA3CITY_DESC.en: Providing capital for the whole continent, many of the big banks have their headquarters in Eastshire.\n\nSupport civilians with Supplies and they will reward you with money!

HFE_WCITY_DESC.en: The city of Westford is known for mining operations in the Northern Mountains and for supplying the other regions with minerals and other raw materials.\n\nSupport civilians with Supplies and they will reward you with money!

HFE_DRIVE_VOLUNTEER_WORK_CROPS_DESC.en: Earn %U cash by providing the citizens with supplies, so they can get back to their feet.

HFE_DRIVE_CIVIL_DEFENSE_CORP_DESC.en: Earn %U cash by providing supplies to the town for civilian defenses and neighborhood guards.

HFE_DRIVE_VEHICLE_RECYCYLING_DESC.en: Earn %U cash by delivering supplies to the local markets and shops, boosting morale and easing down the food rationing.

HFE_DRIVE_ENERGY_CONSERVATION_DESC.en: Earn %U cash by using supplies to build the city's infrastructure and factories.

HFE_DRIVE_AMMO_FACTORIES_DESC.en: Earn %U cash by supplying the local factories and boosting the job market.

HFE_DRIVE_FACILITIES_DESC.en: Earn %U cash by delivering supplies for re-distribution and helping those in need.

BUILDING_COMMANDO_DESC.en: Unlocks the Commando unit\nAllows 3 more Infantry Units

BUILDING_FACTORY_DESC.en: Unlocks Main Battle Tank\nAllows 3 more vehicle units

BUILDING_TESTSITE_DESC.en: Unlocks Rocket Battery\nAllows 2 more artillery units

UNIT_SPECIAL_FORCES_DESC.en: Special Infantry Unit\nSpecial:\nStealth (Can move behind enemy lines)

GOLD_XS_DESC_SECONDARY.en: Out of supplies? Get those supply packs soldier!

GOLD_SMALL_DESC_SECONDARY.en: Out of supplies? Get those supply packs soldier!

GOLD_MEDIUM_DESC_SECONDARY.en: Always be prepared! This should help you hit back with Air Strikes.

GOLD_LARGE_DESC_SECONDARY.en: In the battlefield and out of energy? Fuel up now!

GOLD_XL_DESC_SECONDARY.en: Unlock some mean machines to hit the enemy back hard!

GOLD_XXL_DESC_SECONDARY.en: Unlock some mean machines to hit the enemy back hard!

CASH_XS_DESC_SECONDARY.en: Want to strengthen your defenses? Shell out some change, comrade!

CASH_SMALL_DESC_SECONDARY.en: Buy buildings to increase your artillery capacity!

CASH_MEDIUM_DESC_SECONDARY.en: Buy buildings to increase your artillery capacity!

CASH_LARGE_DESC_SECONDARY.en: You need storage space to prepare for war. Want some?

CASH_XL_DESC_SECONDARY.en: Get a massive amount of cash to fund the war. Victory is near.

CASH_XXL_DESC_SECONDARY.en: Get a massive amount of cash to fund the war. Victory is near.

INSTALLATION_MORTARPIT_DESC.en: Defense fortification with mortar. Fires back at attacking enemies.

INSTALLATION_SNIPERNEST_DESC.en: Defense fortification with snipers. Fires back at attacking enemies.

INSTALLATION_LOG_BUNKER_DESC.en: Strong defense fortification. Fires back at attacking enemies.

INSTALLATION_PILLBOX_DESC.en: Reinforced defense fortification. Fires back at attacking enemies.

INSTALLATION_GUARD_TOWER_DESC.en: A lookout tower that provides visibility for a large area and fires back at attacking enemies.

INSTALLATION_BARBWIRE_DESC.en: Tough passive defense that blocks enemy movement.

INSTALLATION_MINES_DESC.en: Light passive defense that blocks enemy movement.

AREA_S_DESC_SECONDARY.en: Intelligence says Tubman should be an easy match. Attack at will!

AREA_SW_DESC_SECONDARY.en: McDuff has enslaved a huge number of civilians. It is up to you to liberate them!

AREA_SE_DESC_SECONDARY.en: Stark is a professional soldier. Proceed with extreme caution.

AREA_W_DESC_SECONDARY.en: Another territory belonging to Chief McDuff. Capture it immediately!

AREA_C_DESC_SECONDARY.en: This is Viceroy Vile's current base of operations. It is heavily defended. You must rely on Air Strikes soldier!!

AREA_E_DESC_SECONDARY.en: Governor James Fierce fights dirty. Use heavy units soldier!.

AREA_NW_DESC.en: The Western Heights is a slightly colder region behind the mountains.

AREA_NW_DESC_SECONDARY.en: No intelligence is available, except that this area is very strategic to the war!.

AREA_N_DESC.en: Northland is a valley surrounded by some mountains.

AREA_N_DESC_SECONDARY.en: A dangerous area controlled by unknown enemy forces. Previous attempts to capture this Northland have failed!

AREA_NE_DESC.en: Eastern Mountains is accessable only from the west. The mountains block the direct assault from southern regions.

AREA_NE_DESC_SECONDARY.en: Soldier, we need to gain control of these mountains. Unfortunately, we have no intelligence to help you.

EXPAND_AREA_DESCRIPTION.en: Buy new maps from the shop.

AREA_SE_UNLOCKED.en: Colonel Stark occupies the whole East Coast with his efficient war machine, fueled by the industrial city of Eastport.

AREA_SW_UNLOCKED.en: The West Coast is under the thrall of the maniacal Chief McDuff. It is imperative that we liberate the large civilian population of Westbay!

AREA_W_UNLOCKED.en: Westford in Western Plains was once a peaceful center of agriculture, but now it's being crushed under the fist of Chief McDuff.

AREA_C_UNLOCKED.en: The once great Capital District has now become the seat of power for the repulsive Viceroy Vile. Metropol C.D. must be liberated at all costs!

AREA_E_UNLOCKED.en: I hate to think about what has become of the majestic East Midlands forests. The slippery Governor Fierco must be hiding in Eastshire. Find him!

AREA_NW_UNLOCKED.en: Granite Falls is the largest and most defensible military complex in Western Heights. It's there that you must find and bring Chief McDuff to justice.

AREA_N_UNLOCKED.en: The cold Northland region is under the grip of Viceroy Vile. He rules from deep within his base in Windpeak â€“ the most formidable fortress ever created.

AREA_NE_UNLOCKED.en: The once-luxurious Sunrise Hill in the Eastern Mountains is now under the thumb of the slimy Governor James Fierce.

MEDAL_1_DESC.en: Crosses help you to climb those military ranks

MEDAL_2_DESC.en: Crosses help you to climb those military ranks

MEDAL_3_DESC.en: All true war heroes have one

INTEL_NAME_DESC.en: Collect Intel to open up new maps. Hint: blow up Propaganda Towers

MATERIAL_HARDHAT_DESC.en: Fuel Dumps, Barricades and Bunkers are the most common source for Hard Hats

MATERIAL_CINDERBLOCK_DESC.en: Fuel Dumps, Barricades and Bunkers are the most common source for Cement

MATERIAL_LUMBER_DESC.en: Fuel Dumps, Barricades and Bunkers are the most common source for Lumber

MATERIAL_REBARS_DESC.en: Carried sometimes by Enemy Scouts, Infantry and Stormtroopers

MATERIAL_ARTILLERYTUBES_DESC.en: Carried occasionally by enemy Artillery units

MATERIAL_BLACKBOX_DESC.en: Rare item carried by enemy's Rocket Batteries

MATERIAL_COMMANDOKNIFE_DESC.en: Enemy Stormtroopers may drop Commando Knives upon destruction

MATERIAL_STEELPLATES_DESC.en: Unique items carried occasionally by enemy's Battle Tanks

ACTION_FRIENDLY_UNIT_DYING.en: One of your units was destroyed! Buy more units from the shop and make sure to keep them repaired if they're damaged.

ACTION_FRIENDLY_UNIT_1HEALTH.en: Commander, one of the Units taking part in the attack is so damaged that it may be destroyed! Are you sure we should continue?

ACTION_FRIENDLY_UNIT_CORPSE_MARKER.en: This Unit is down and needs immediate medevac to survive! Use Supplies to heal the Unit.

POPUP_MULTIATTACK_TEXT.en: Use more than 1 unit to attack enemies to deal more damage and spend less energy!

LEVELUP_SHARE.en: Nice work! Share this day of glory with your Allies now!

SOCIAL_LEVELUP_SHARE.en: Nice work! You should share your new promotion with your Allies!

OUT_OF_ORDERS_TEXT.en: You're out of Energy! Wait for Energy to reload, request Energy or purchase Energy Packs from the Shop!

CANNOT_ATTACK_TEXT.en: No units in range to attack!

OUT_OF_STEEL_TEXT.en: You need %0U supplies to perform this task but you only have %1U

VISIT_ALLY_REWARD_INFO.en: Reward's for visiting %U's front.\nYou can get the visit bonus once per Ally per day\nYour Honor level affects the total amount of visit bonuses per day.

SOCIAL_ENERGY_BOX_DESC.en: Notify your Ally of the help you provided, and leave an Energy pack behind!

SOCIAL_ENERGY_ZERO_FLOATING.en: Can't do that! \nNo more actions left!

INTRO_MOVIE_BEGINNING.en: Our homeland was prosperous and peaceful, but nothing ever lasts...

INTRO_MOVIE_ENDING.en: The Crimson Empire attack was fast and vicious. You are here to turn the desperate tide!

BUILDING_STATUS_DAMAGED_PRODUCTION_READY.en: Damaged. Repair to collect daily bonus

BUILDING_STATUS_IDLE_HFE_PLOT.en: Click to set supply production here

BUILDING_STATUS_IDLE_TOWN.en: Click to sell supplies to the town

BUILDING_STATUS_PRODUCING_HFE.en: Supplies ready in %U\nAsk high command to send supplies Now.You have a war to fight!

BUILDING_STATUS_WHITERS_IN.en: Supplies ready â€“ Click to collect

ALLY_REPORT_DESC.en: Visit your Allies daily to receive these reports.

CAMPAIGN_WINDOW_INVITE_TIP.en: Invite Allies! Receive Energy and Supplies by helping the Blue Units and engaging the Enemy on your Ally's battlefield.

BRAGG_FRONT_MAP_1.en: Ok, listen up. We have a fort out there that's currently under siege. Help them out the best you can!

BRAGG_FRONT_MAP_2.en: One of our supply convoys was ambushed in a nearby forest, see if you can drop some lead on them or help our troops!

BRAGG_FRONT_MAP_3.en: The enemy has breached through our defences! Attack the enemy units and send supplies to our troops!

UNLOCK_BOOTCAMP_INTRO_DESC.en: We have destroyed an enemy Infantry Unit. Destroying another similar unit will unlock the ability to build Boot Camp buildings. Boot Camps will allow us to build up our own infantry force.

UNLOCK_MOTORPOOL_INTRO_DESC.en: We have destroyed an enemy APC. Destroying another similar unit will unlock the ability to build Motor Pool buildings, that will allow us to build up our own APC force.

UNLOCK_ARSENAL_INTRO_DESC.en: We have destroyed an enemy artillery unit. Destroying another similar unit will unlock the ability to build an Arsenal building. Arsenal will allow us to build up our own artillery batteries.

UNLOCK_COMMANDO_INTRO_DESC.en: We have destroyed enemy Stormtroopers. Destroying another similar unit will unlock the ability to build a Commando School. The Commando School will allow us to build up the Commando.

UNLOCK_FACTORY_INTRO_DESC.en: We have destroyed an enemy armor. Destroying another armor will unlock the ability to build a Factory. Factories will allow us to build up our own Battle Tank army.

UNLOCK_TESTSITE_INTRO_DESC.en: We have destroyed an enemy Rocket Battery. Destroying another Rocket Battery will unlock the ability to construct a Test Site. Test Site is the key to building our own rocket artillery units.

UNLOCK_BOOTCAMP_DESC.en: Before building a Boot Camp, we need more experience with fighting the enemy infantry.

UNLOCK_MOTORPOOL_DESC.en: Before building a Motor Pool, we need more experience with fighting the enemy APCs.

UNLOCK_ARSENAL_DESC.en: Before building a Arsenal, we need more experience with fighting the enemy artillery.

UNLOCK_COMMANDO_DESC.en: Before building a Commando School, we need more experience with fighting the enemy Stormtroopers.

UNLOCK_FACTORY_DESC.en: Before building a Factory, we need more experience with fighting the enemy armor.

UNLOCK_TESTSITE_DESC.en: Before building a Test Site, we need more experience with fighting the enemy rocket batteries.

UNLOCK_BOOTCAMP_COMPLETION.en: Second infantry destroyed. The Boot Camp has been unlocked in the shop.

UNLOCK_MOTORPOOL_COMPLETION.en: Second APC destroyed. The Motor Pool has been unlocked in the shop.

UNLOCK_ARSENAL_COMPLETION.en: Second artillery destroyed. The Arsenal has been unlocked in the shop.

UNLOCK_COMMANDO_COMPLETION.en: Second Stormtrooper destroyed. The Commando School has been unlocked in the shop.

UNLOCK_FACTORY_COMPLETION.en: Second armor destroyed. The Factory has been unlocked in the shop.

UNLOCK_TESTSITE_COMPLETION.en: Second Rocket Battery destroyed. The Test Site has been unlocked in the shop.

MISSION_SCROLL_DESC.en: Take a look around the battlefield â€“ Press the mouse button down and drag your mouse. Try it now!

MISSION_ZOOM_DESC.en: Get a better view of the battlefield â€“ Click the zoom slider now!

MISSION_FULL_SCREEN_DESC.en: Get a better view of the battlefield in fullscreen â€“ Click the fullscreen button now!

MISSION_AREA_S_1_DESC.en: Supplies are necessary for keeping our forces in fighting condition. Collect resources from the terrain.

MISSION_AREA_S_1_OBJECTIVE_1.en: Click on Oil Containers to collect Supplies.

MISSION_AREA_S_1_OBJECTIVE_2.en: Click on Ammo Crates to collect Supplies.

MISSION_AREA_S_1_HINT.en: You can set up new resource production in empty Drop Zones.

MISSION_AREA_S_1_COMPLETION.en: Good! Steady production of Supplies keeps the war machine well-oiled!

MISSION_AREA_S_1_FEED_TEXT.en: %PLAYER is gearing up for the big fight! Are you prepared?

MISSION_AREA_S_2_DESC.en: Begin reconstructing our war-torn lands by setting up Drop Zones.

MISSION_AREA_S_2_OBJECTIVE_1.en: Buy Drop Zones from the Shop, underneath â€œSuppliesâ€œ

MISSION_AREA_S_2_OBJ2_TIP.en: Click on an empty Drop Zone and ask for Ammo Crates from the HQ.

MISSION_AREA_S_2_OBJ3_TIP.en: Click on a Drop Zone with an Ammo Crates order when they ready to be collected.

MISSION_AREA_S_2_COMPLETION.en: Excellent! Soon, our Homeland will be restored to its former glory!\nYou can find the rewarded Supply Pack in you inventory!

MISSION_AREA_S_2_1_DESC.en: Ammo Crates take time to produce Supplies. Wait until they're ready and your patience will be rewarded.

MISSION_AREA_S_2_1_COMPLETION.en: These Supplies will be crucial to healing our units and defenses!

MISSION_AREA_S_2_FEED_TEXT.en: %PLAYER is building up an army! Do you have what it takes to join the fight?

MISSION_AREA_S_3_INTRODESC.en: You have demonstrated courage against the odds, but I fear our darkest hour is still ahead. We will need to draw upon the strength of Allies if we're going to win this war.

MISSION_AREA_S_3_DESC.en: There are other armies engaging the Crimson Empire forces that may be willing to share resources or lend a helping hand.

MISSION_AREA_S_3_OBJECTIVE_1.en: Click the Add button at the bottom of the screen to add Allies.

MISSION_AREA_S_3_OBJECTIVE_2.en: Click on your Allies at the bottom of the screen to visit them.

MISSION_AREA_S_3_HINT.en: Visiting Allies rewards you with bonus Energy and Resources!

MISSION_AREA_S_3_COMPLETION.en: With our combined might, we will surely be victorious! Add as many Allies as you can!

MISSION_AREA_S_3_FEED_TEXT.en: Will you become one of %PLAYER's Allies and help defeat the Crimson Empire?

MISSION_AREA_S_4_INTRODESC.en: Never forget that diplomacy is a valuable tool in war!\nLet's start helping our Allies, starting with General Bragg!

MISSION_AREA_S_4_DESC.en: We need to asssist our Allies every once in a while, and General Bragg's missions are a good place to start. Visit Bragg for a status report â€“ help him and any other Allies as much you can!

MISSION_AREA_S_4_OBJ_1.en: Attack Enemy troops in an Ally's area

MISSION_AREA_S_4_OBJ_2.en: Click on friendly troops in an Ally's area

MISSION_AREA_S_4_COMPLETION.en: Our Allies will surely return the favor when we're in need.

MISSION_AREA_S_4_HEADER.en: Mission Complete: An Ally in Need

MISSION_AREA_S_4_FEED_TEXT.en: %PLAYER is becoming a key player in the war against the Crimson Empire. Come join the battle!

MISSION_AREA_S_RECONSTRUCTION_INTRODESC.en: You have liberated the region from the evil clutches of The Crimson Empire! My economic advisor says we can help stimulate the stagnant economy by selling the citizens Supplies at low cost.

MISSION_AREA_S_RECONSTRUCTION_DESC.en: Click on the city of Southgate to sell Supplies and receive Cash.

MISSION_AREA_S_RECONSTRUCTION_COMPLETION.en: Excellent! The Southgate economy has already begun picking up!

MISSION_AREA_S_5_DESC.en: We need to harness the region's agriculture to produce Supplies for the military before you begin assaulting the other provinces.

MISSION_AREA_S_5_OBJECTIVE_2.en: Click ready Gasoline Drops to collect Supplies when ready.

MISSION_AREA_S_5_OBJECTIVE_3.en: Click ready M.R.E Containers to collect Supplies when ready.

MISSION_AREA_S_5_HINT.en: You can buy more storage space from the Supplies page in the Shop.

MISSION_AREA_S_5_COMPLETION.en: Preparation will be the key to winning this war!

MISSION_AREA_S_5_HEADER.en: Mission Complete: Heart of the Nation

MISSION_AREA_S_5_FEED_TEXT.en: %PLAYER is fighting for liberation and rebuilding a war-torn nation! Join the war efforts!

MISSION_AREA_S_EXPAND_INTRODESC_1.en: Now that we have liberated this region, we should look to the Eastern Coast and strike at the heart of their industrial power!

MISSION_AREA_S_EXPAND_INTRODESC_2.en: General Bragg, I must disagree. I strongly urge you to think of the Western Coast, where the largest civilian population lives. The people need us!

MISSION_AREA_S_EXPAND_INTRODESC_3.en: We'll agree to disagree, Mrs. President. At this point, we should let our Commander in the field decide.

MISSION_AREA_S_EXPAND_INTRODESC_4.en: Commander, it's your call. Go and open either the Eastern or Western region and continue your attack.

MISSION_EXPAND_INTEL_DESC.en: Commander, we need some additional Intel so we can broaden our offensive. I gave you some intel previously, but you can hunt the rest of them down by taking out Propaganda Towers.

MISSION_EXPAND_INTEL_COMPLETION.en: Good Job Commander, we're set to get this war on another gear!

MISSION_EXPAND_TIP_DESC.en: Open additional maps from the Shop to expand your war and face off with Viceroy Vile's other evil henchmen!

MISSION_EXPAND_AREA_DESC.en: Use the Intel gained to unlock either the Eastern or Western region maps. You can find the maps from the Shop.\n\nNote: All Enemy Units have a chance of dropping Intel when destroyed.

MISSION_EXPAND_AREA_COMPLETION.en: The decision is made, there's no turning back. Push forward into the new region!

MISSION_EXPAND_OBJECTIVE_1.en: Open a new map area from the Shop under â€œMapsâ€

MISSION_COMBAT_S_1_DESC.en: We're sitting ducks out here until you sweep the area and establish a defensive perimeter.\nGive your APC a test run too, but move out immediately!

MISSION_COMBAT_S_1_OBJECTIVE_1.en: Destroy an Enemy Unit\nAttack with multiple units for bonus damage.

MISSION_COMBAT_S_1_OBJECTIVE_2.en: Send the APC to destroy an Enemy Unit.

MISSION_COMBAT_S_1_COMPLETION.en: Good work, soldier! Our perimeter is secure, but this is no time to relax. The battle has just begun!

MISSION_COMBAT_S_1_FEED_TEXT.en: %PLAYER has established a beachhead! Will you join the battle?

MISSION_COMBAT_S_2_DESC.en: We need to start building a base out here, so it's time to put up a HQ. It increases our Troop Capacity and unlocks other buildings and defenses.

MISSION_COMBAT_S_2_OBJ1_TIP.en: You can buy an HQ from the Buildings page in the Shop.

MISSION_COMBAT_S_2_COMPLETION.en: Good job Commander, finish constructing the HQ so we can start deploying other buildings and defenses.

MISSION_COMBAT_S_2_OUTRO.en: It's your lucky day, Commander! I've sent you a brand new Artillery Unit! It's got quite a long range, so use it wisely.

MISSION_COMBAT_S_2_OUTRO_2.en: Tap the gear wheel icon to open items menu.

MISSION_COMBAT_S_2_OUTRO_3.en: Tap the higlighted icon to open items window and place the Artillery unit on the map.

MISSION_COMBAT_S_2_FEED_TEXT.en: %PLAYER is setting up a base camp, and preparing a massive offensive!

MISSION_COMBAT_S_3_DESC.en: Sometimes the best strategy is a punch in the face. Let's hit 'em with a jab and see what they've got!

MISSION_COMBAT_S_3_OBJECTIVE_1.en: Attack with your units to destroy them

MISSION_COMBAT_S_3_HINT.en: Attacking enemies with more than one unit will deal additional damage.

MISSION_COMBAT_S_3_COMPLETION.en: The mission was a success! Now they know we mean business.

MISSION_COMBAT_S_3B_DESC.en: Place the artillery you just received to get some supporting fire for your troops. You can find it in the Items Inventory.

MISSION_COMBAT_S_3B_OBJECTIVE_1.en: Find it by clicking ITEMS at bottom right â€“ place it on your own open territory.

MISSION_COMBAT_S_3B_COMPLETION.en: Well done, now give that Artillery a spin and notice it's impressive attack range.

MISSION_AREA_SC_5_OBJECTIVE_1_DESC.en: Make sure you have enough Intel in Items Inventory â€“ get them from Propaganda Towers.

MISSION_COMBAT_S_DEFENSE_DESC.en: We're not out of the woods yet! Tubman is preparing a counter-attack as we speak. Get a defense perimeter around Southgate before he can strike!

MISSION_COMBAT_S_DEFENSE_COMPLETION.en: Excellent work, Commander! If the enemy shows his head, we'll cut it right off!

MISSION_COMBAT_S_DEFENSE_OBJ1_DESC.en: Place the Watchtower near the northern border to see where the enemy deploys.

MISSION_COMBAT_S_DEFENSE_OBJ2_DESC.en: Take back the area around Southgate

MISSION_COMBAT_S_HORDE_DESC.en: Our intel indicates that Tubman has ordered a full on assault to take back Southgate! Use coordinated attacks and the Artillery I sent you to push them back!

MISSION_COMBAT_S_HORDE_COMPLETION.en: Great work! The enemy onslaught has been stopped!

MISSION_COMBAT_S_HORDE_OBJ1_DESC.en: The defenses can help you slow down their advance.

MISSION_COMBAT_S_HORDE_OBJ2_DESC.en: Destroy Enemy with the Artillery. Place it from your ITEMS inventory if you haven't already.

MISSION_COMBAT_S_HORDE_OBJ3_DESC.en: Destroy an Enemy Unit by firing at it with more than 1 Friendly Unit.

MISSION_COMBAT_S_HORDE_OUTRO.en: ...*Sniffle*... You defeated my army, Benevolent Comrade Vile will never forgive me!

MISSION_COMBAT_S_HORDE_OUTRO2.en: Tubman, you have failed me. Haul yourself to the HQ, time for a career change, I think.

MISSION_AREA_SW_1_DESC.en: This war is especially rough on the civilian population. Let's help them out by clearing away the destruction left in the wake of battle.

MISSION_AREA_SW_1_OBJECTIVE_1.en: Click on Debris to clear it.

MISSION_AREA_SW_1_OBJECTIVE_2.en: Place Drop Zones from the Supplies page in the Shop.

MISSION_AREA_SW_1_HINT.en: Battles with enemies can leave behind Debris.

MISSION_AREA_SW_1_COMPLETION.en: The sooner we clean up this whole mess, the sooner the civilians can return to their peaceful lives.

MISSION_AREA_SW_1_FEED_TEXT.en: %PLAYER is sticking it to the enemy and taking out the trash! Come join the fight!

MISSION_AREA_SW_2_DESC.en: This area was once fertile land, but the ruthless Chief McDuff stripped and burned it all. We must help them rebuild!

MISSION_AREA_SW_2_OBJECTIVE_1.en: Click empty Drop Zones to ask for M.R.E Containers from the HQ.

MISSION_AREA_SW_2_OBJECTIVE_2.en: Click Drop Zones that have ready M.R.E Containers to harvest supplies..

MISSION_AREA_SW_2_HINT.en: You can trade Supplies to the civilians of every town for cash.

MISSION_AREA_SW_2_COMPLETION.en: You have shown that hope grows in even the darkest light.

MISSION_AREA_SW_2_HEADER.en: Mission Complete: Seeds of a Nation

MISSION_AREA_SW_2_FEED_TEXT.en: %PLAYER has shown great military as well as agricultural prowess.

MISSION_AREA_SW_3_DESC.en: Our Allies are busy fending off enemy threats. Let's help them out with their production.

MISSION_AREA_SW_3_OBJECTIVE_1.en: Click on the Visit button on the Ally's picture to visit them.

MISSION_AREA_SW_3_OBJECTIVE_2.en: Speed up a drop zone that is waiting for supply drop by clicking it

MISSION_AREA_SW_3_OBJECTIVE_3.en: Click on an Ally's unit to heal it.

MISSION_AREA_SW_3_COMPLETION.en: Diplomatic relationships ensure that we can count on help when we need it.

MISSION_AREA_SW_3_FEED_TEXT.en: %PLAYER has become an important Ally in the war against the Crimson Empire!

MISSION_AREA_SW_4_DESC.en: Our troops have been constantly on the move. Let's give them a breather, and take some time to Heal and stock Supplies.

MISSION_AREA_SW_4_OBJECTIVE_1.en: Use the Repair tool to Repair damaged units.

MISSION_AREA_SW_4_OBJECTIVE_2.en: Buy a Warehouse from the Storage page in the Shop.

MISSION_AREA_SW_4_HINT.en: Warehouses increase the amount of Supplies you can have at one time.

MISSION_AREA_SW_4_COMPLETION.en: Good work, soldier. Now move out before those soldiers get lazy.

MISSION_AREA_SW_4_FEED_TEXT.en: %PLAYER knows that when a soldier stops griping, it's time for some rest and relaxation - Get some!

MISSION_AREA_SW_5_INTRO.en: Good Intel is the key to strategic dominance over the battlefield. When you eliminate Enemy Units, don't forget to check if they dropped any important documents!

MISSION_AREA_SW_5_DESC.en: Some Enemy Units carry important Intel. Intercept and eliminate them to see if they drop any!

MISSION_AREA_SW_5_COMPLETION.en: Well done, Commander! This is some valuable reading material you've found! Consider purchasing additional maps.

MISSION_COMBAT_SW_HORDE_INTRO.en: Oh no, you've struck a mighty blow with your superior military prowess and I have no choice but to surrender...\nBWAHAHAHA JUST KIDDING! I've got you right where I want you, fool!

MISSION_COMBAT_SW_HORDE_DESC.en: Commander! Chief McDuff has deployed forces at the border! You're gonna have to fight your way out of there! Use Fire Calls if you have them!

MISSION_COMBAT_SW_HORDE_OBJECTIVE_1.en: Remember, counterattacks can hurt your units!

MISSION_COMBAT_SW_HORDE_OBJECTIVE_2.en: Eliminate Enemy Units with Fire Calls â€“ tap on menu option to access the Fire call button.

MISSION_COMBAT_SW_HORDE_COMPLETION.en: That was a little too close. We'll be ready for it, next time!

MISSION_COMBAT_SW_HORDE_FEED_TEXT.en: %PLAYER survived an ambush! Come test your mettle!

MISSION_COMBAT_SW_HORDE_OUTRO.en: Well done, Commander! You've been sent some reinforcements from HQ!

MISSION_COMBAT_SW_PROPAGANDA_DESC.en: Chief McDuff uses Propaganda Stations along the eastern border to keep the civilians under his grip. Your mission is to take them out!

MISSION_COMBAT_SW_0_OBJECTIVE_1.en: They take some punishment, but at least don't fire back!

MISSION_COMBAT_SW_PROPAGANDA_COMPLETION.en: Good job, soldier. He won't be able to broadcast his lies any longer!

MISSION_COMBAT_SW_1_DESC.en: Chief McDuff thinks he's safe behind his formidable defense line around Westbay. Your mission is to take out his defenses and show that he's wrong!

MISSION_COMBAT_SW_1_OBJECTIVE_1.en: Remember, counterattacks can hurt your units!

MISSION_COMBAT_SW_1_OBJECTIVE_2.en: The bunkers and fortifications take a lot of punishment.

MISSION_COMBAT_SW_1_HINT.en: Positioning is crucial. The defense looks impenetrable, but keep an eye out for weaknesses.

MISSION_COMBAT_SW_1_COMPLETION.en: Great job, soldier! You're one tough cookie!

MISSION_COMBAT_SW_1_FEED_TEXT.en: %PLAYER is one tough cookie! Are you?

MISSION_COMBAT_SW_2_DESC.en: We're too vulnerable like this. You need to set up a defensive perimeter so we can launch attacks without retaliation.

MISSION_COMBAT_SW_2_OBJECTIVE_1.en: Click on an Ally's Unit to heal it.

MISSION_COMBAT_SW_2_OBJECTIVE_2.en: Find a Log Bunker from the Defenses page in the Shop.

MISSION_COMBAT_SW_2_OBJECTIVE_3.en: Find a Mortar Pit from the Defenses page in the Shop.

MISSION_COMBAT_SW_2_HINT.en: Defensive structures fire back at attacking enemy units.

MISSION_COMBAT_SW_2_COMPLETION.en: Good job! Sometimes the best offense is a good defense.

MISSION_COMBAT_SW_4_INTRO.en: Good day, Commander. I'm Lieutenant O'Neill. My platoon has an important mission to the North, but our path is blocked by Enemy forces.

MISSION_COMBAT_SW_4_INTRO2.en: We need your troops to punch a hole in the Enemy line and clear a path for us to slip through!

MISSION_COMBAT_SW_4_DESC.en: Chief McDuff's well-placed Artillery are proving to be a formidable nuisance. Take them out and clear the path for Lieutenant O'Neill!

MISSION_COMBAT_SW_4_OBJECTIVE_1.en: Artillery units have a deadly ranged attack, but can be taken out quickly.

MISSION_COMBAT_SW_4_OBJECTIVE_2.en: Destroy any of the enemy buildings and installations

MISSION_COMBAT_SW_4_HINT.en: Artillery units have a deadly ranged attack, but can be taken out quickly.

MISSION_COMBAT_SW_4_COMPLETION.en: Good job! You've given O'Neill's platoon the support they needed to reach their mission objective!

MISSION_COMBAT_SW_4_FEED_TEXT.en: %PLAYER has shown the enemy who's got the bigger guns! Come join the fight!

MISSION_COMBAT_SW_4_OUTRO.en: Thanks Commander! You sure made a lot of noise! See you on the other side!

MISSION_COMBAT_SW_5_DESC.en: Our army is getting spread out as we cover more ground. You need to set up some hard defense structures to protect the areas where our troops are thin.

MISSION_COMBAT_SW_5_OBJECTIVE_2.en: Find Mortar Pits from the Defenses page in the Shop.

MISSION_COMBAT_SW_5_HINT.en: Mortar Pits are a good defensive structure, but also a bit expensive.

MISSION_COMBAT_SW_5_COMPLETION.en: Well done. With good defenses in place, our troops can march on!

MISSION_COMBAT_SW_5_FEED_TEXT.en: %PLAYER has dug-in and built defenses â€“ help him beat the incoming attack!

MISSION_AREA_SE_1_DESC.en: Stark has been deadly efficient here in his strip-mining operations. We need to clear up and stabilize our Supply Drop capability.

MISSION_AREA_SE_1_OBJECTIVE_1.en: Click on a debris tile to clear it.

MISSION_AREA_SE_1_OBJECTIVE_2.en: The drop zones can be found from the Supplies page of the Shop.

MISSION_AREA_SE_1_COMPLETION.en: The troop morale is getting higher, thanks to better Supply lines! Good work, Commander!

MISSION_AREA_SE_1_FEED_TEXT.en: War leaves it's mark, want it or not. But %PLAYER is at least helping out by cleaning the place â€“ Join the fight!

MISSION_AREA_SE_2_DESC.en: The local population needs more work! Ask for some Oil Containers from the Drop Zones, so they can be employed and then deliver supplies to your army!

MISSION_AREA_SE_2_OBJECTIVE_1.en: Click on a Drop Zone to order in some Oil Containers.

MISSION_AREA_SE_2_COMPLETION.en: Good work, come back later to collect the Supplies!

MISSION_AREA_SE_2_FEED_TEXT.en: %PLAYER got a fresh batch of supplies for the army â€“ Join the fight!

MISSION_AREA_SE_3_INTRO.en: Commander, the Enemy is jamming our long-range communications, but there's an urgent message slipping through!

MISSION_AREA_SE_3_INTRO2.en: ...*Bzzz*...*tsk*gent help required!..\n*tsk*Fierce in East Midla*BZZ* ...*tsk*Supplies requir*tsk*\n*BZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ*

MISSION_AREA_SE_3_INTRO3.en: From the fragments we've pieced together, it sounds like things are going poorly for the East Midlands resistance. Give them some aid!

MISSION_AREA_SE_3_DESC.en: The resistance fighters in East Midlands are in dire need of supplies! We should aid them before we can build a presence there.

MISSION_AREA_SE_3_OBJECTIVE_1.en: Buy a Warehouse from the Shop

MISSION_AREA_SE_3_OBJECTIVE_2.en: Once you have the required amount, they will be automatically distributed.

MISSION_AREA_SE_3_COMPLETION.en: Long live the resistance! The East Midlands resistance fighters will put those supplies to good use.

MISSION_AREA_SE_3_HEADER.en: Mission Complete: Back to the People

MISSION_AREA_SE_3_FEED_TEXT.en: %PLAYER is giving back to the people â€“ join in the effort!

MISSION_AREA_SE_3_OUTRO.en: We're receiving another scrambled message, Commander.

MISSION_AREA_SE_3_OUTRO2.en: ...*BZZZ*ank you for your help, we*TSK*ooking forward to*BZZ*action over here!\nBlack Fox out!*KCH*

MISSION_AREA_SE_4_DESC.en: We are only as strong as our Alliance. Help our Allies in their efforts to rebuild our nation.

MISSION_AREA_SE_4_OBJECTIVE_1.en: Click on an Ally's expired Drop Zone to do this.

MISSION_AREA_SE_4_OBJECTIVE_2.en: Click on any an Ally's ongoing Supply Production to speed it up.

MISSION_AREA_SE_4_COMPLETION.en: Thanks to your help, our Allies can be certain that they are not fighting alone.

MISSION_AREA_SE_4_FEED_TEXT.en: %PLAYER knows the value of friends â€“ be one in the elite circle!

MISSION_AREA_SE_5_INTRO.en: Good Intel is the key to strategic dominance over the battlefield. When you eliminate Enemy Units, don't forget to check if they dropped any important documents!

MISSION_AREA_SE_5_DESC.en: Some Enemy Units carry important Intel. Intercept and eliminate them to see if they drop any!

MISSION_AREA_SE_5_COMPLETION.en: Well done, Commander! This is some valuable reading material you've found! Consider purchasing additional maps.

MISSION_AREA_SE_5_FEED_TEXT.en: %PLAYER has gathered enough Intel to expand his theater of war â€“ Join the fight!

MISSION_COMBAT_SE_1_DESC.en: The border area is heavily mined and fortified â€“ Stark also has some formidable artillery units, so you need to move fast and decisively!

MISSION_COMBAT_SE_1_OBJECTIVE_1.en: Destroy the minefields using your units

MISSION_COMBAT_SE_1_OBJECTIVE_2.en: They are weak, but have a dangerous ranged attack!

MISSION_COMBAT_SE_1_COMPLETION.en: Shock and awe, son, shock and awe! The road is open for our forces to advance through!

MISSION_COMBAT_SE_1_FEED_TEXT.en: %PLAYER launched a devastating attack and paved a road to victory!

MISSION_COMBAT_SE_HORDE_INTRO.en: You're clever, but have you anticipated my next move? Panzer Division, STRIKE!

MISSION_COMBAT_SE_HORDE_DESC.en: Colonel Stark has launched a surprise attack with his powerful Panzer Division. Take out those tanks!

MISSION_COMBAT_SE_HORDE_COMPLETION.en: Well executed! Stark's tanks are out of commission!

MISSION_COMBAT_SE_HORDE_OUTRO.en: Very clever indeed, Commander. I shall not underestimate you in the future.

MISSION_COMBAT_SE_2_DESC.en: Spread out and engage! Take out the enemy forces wherever you meet them. No mercy!

MISSION_COMBAT_SE_2_OBJECTIVE_1.en: Destroy any of the enemy Units.

MISSION_COMBAT_SE_2_OBJECTIVE_3.en: Use the heal tool to fix your troops.

MISSION_COMBAT_SE_2_COMPLETION.en: Well done! Your spearhead assault is well on it's way!

MISSION_COMBAT_SE_2_OUTRO.en: Strategy without tactics is the slowest route to victory. Tactics without strategy is the noise before defeat.

MISSION_COMBAT_SE_HORDE2_INTRO.en: A-ha! I knew you'd hit my bunkers and so have fallen victim to my strategic gambit!

MISSION_COMBAT_SE_HORDE2_DESC.en: Colonel Stark has deployed a formidable infantry division. They are strongly armored, so coordinate attacks with multiple units to destroy them!

MISSION_COMBAT_SE_HORDE2_COMPLETION.en: Well done, Commander! You have overcome Stark's elite infantry!

MISSION_COMBAT_SE_HORDE2_OBJ1_DESC.en: Destroy Stark's Strikeforce by attacking them with more than 1 unit at a time.

MISSION_COMBAT_SE_HORDE2_OUTRO.en: Ah, bested again! I've never met a more formidable opponent!

MISSION_COMBAT_SE_3_DESC.en: After Stark switched sides, this region is mostly done for, but there's still some enemy activity we need to flush out.

MISSION_COMBAT_SE_3_OBJECTIVE_3.en: Remember to heal your troops to keep them active.

MISSION_COMBAT_SE_3_COMPLETION.en: Good job Commander, I think this sector is starting to be under our control soon!

MISSION_COMBAT_SE_3_FEED_TEXT.en: %PLAYER stings like a bee and took out a bunch of enemies â€“ Join the fray!

MISSION_AREA_W_1_DESC.en: To be prepared is half the victory! Now that we're in a good position, we need to make sure we have ample supplies for the future.

MISSION_AREA_W_1_COMPLETION.en: Now we're prepared to keep our troops battle ready!

MISSION_AREA_W1_OBJ1_DESC.en: Click on the Drop Zones to order in M.R.E Containers.

MISSION_AREA_W1_OBJ2_DESC.en: Collect the M.R.E Containers once they are delivered

MISSION_AREA_W_2_DESC.en: The situation in Westford is still alarming, even after we liberated it! We need to gather and send them supplies to help with reconstruction!

MISSION_AREA_W_2_COMPLETION.en: The citizens can now begin rebuilding their war-torn city!

MISSION_AREA_W2_OBJ1_DESC.en: Once you have the required amount, they will be automatically distributed.

MISSION_AREA_W_3_INTRO.en: Commander, the citizens of Westford are still in need of supplies. Now that their economy is growing healthier, the proud citizens insist on paying for them.

MISSION_AREA_W_3_DESC.en: We should sell Supplies to the citizens of Westford at a good price, to stimulate their economy and help reconstruction.

MISSION_AREA_W_3_COMPLETION.en: Excellent! Westford has plenty of Supplies, and you've gained some cash to fund our war efforts. That's a win-win situation!

MISSION_AREA_W3_OBJ1_DESC.en: Click on the city of Westford to sell Supplies and receive Cash.

MISSION_AREA_W_3_OUTRO.en: The citizens of Westford are grateful for your help! Their economy is growing healthier but don't forget to support them with more supplies.

MISSION_COMBAT_W_1_DESC.en: McDuff has Guard Stations watching over his Bunkers. We need to take out those Stations and expand our own defensive perimeter while we're at it!

MISSION_COMBAT_W1_OBJ1_DESC.en: Take out the Guard Stations near the Enemy Bunkers.

MISSION_COMBAT_W1_OBJ2_DESC.en: Buy and position Defensive Fire Installations to secure the perimeter.

MISSION_COMBAT_W_2_DESC.en: We've received Intel about some Enemy Fuel Dumps in the northwest area of East Midlands. Destroying these would cut enemy supplies and strike a vicious blow!

MISSION_COMBAT_W_2_COMPLETION.en: Nice work! McDuff won't be pleased about that!

MISSION_COMBAT_W2_OBJ1_DESC.en: Take out the Enemy Fuel Dumps in the Northwest.

MISSION_COMBAT_W_HORDE1_INTRO.en: Enemy Artillery sighted! Prepare for bombardment!

MISSION_COMBAT_W_HORDE1_INTRO2.en: You stink, rat! I think you could use a shower... of explosions! BWAHAHA!

MISSION_COMBAT_W_HORDE1_DESC.en: McDuff has deployed an Artillery Regiment! Take them out before they wreak havoc on our troops!

MISSION_COMBAT_W_HORDE1_COMPLETION.en: Well done! Those Artillery Units are deadly at long range!

MISSION_COMBAT_W_HORDE1_OUTRO.en: GRRRR! What are you, some kind of wizard!? How could you destroy my Artillery Regiment so fast?

MISSION_COMBAT_W_3_INTRO.en: Our Allies have requested aid in the form of Artillery strikes. We're in a strong position on our front, so it's a good time to help out our friends.

MISSION_COMBAT_W_3_DESC.en: Visit our Allies and help take out their opposition. If it's true that good deeds are returned tenfold, we're gonna be looking at some serious firepower.

MISSION_COMBAT_W_3_COMPLETION.en: Excellent work! We're gaining quite a reputation, so it's a good time to reach out to other potential Allies!

MISSION_COMBAT_W3_OBJ1_DESC.en: Visit Allied fronts by clicking on them.

MISSION_COMBAT_W3_OBJ2_DESC.en: Attack Enemy Units on Allied fronts.

MISSION_COMBAT_W_4_DESC.en: We've solidified our position in this area, and Enemy Units are scattered along the borders. It's time to clean house!

MISSION_COMBAT_W_4_COMPLETION.en: Mission accomplished! You've done a fine job liberating this area!

MISSION_COMBAT_W4_OBJ1_DESC.en: Check the borders and eliminate any Enemy Units.

MISSION_COMBAT_W_4_OUTRO.en: Commander, you've done excellent work here! You can either stay in this area and continue mopping up, or move on to another sector. I'll leave it up to you!

MISSION_AREA_C_1_INTRO.en: Witness my power and fury, and you shall kneel before me as your sovereign leader!

MISSION_AREA_C_1_INTRO2.en: Red alert! There's massive enemy movement at the borders!

MISSION_AREA_C_1_DESC.en: Viceroy Vile has launched a massive offensive. Use everything you've got to fight them back! Failure is not an option!

MISSION_AREA_C_1_COMPLETION.en: Hold position and tend to the wounded. We shall celebrate the victory, but mourn the price.

MISSION_AREA_C1_OBJ2_DESC.en: Minimize the loss of your troops by keeping them healed.

MISSION_AREA_C1_OBJ3_DESC.en: Eliminate Enemy Units with Fire Call bombardment.

MISSION_AREA_C_1_OUTRO.en: You impudent child! There will be no peace! This will end only in ashes, I promise you that!!

MISSION_COMBAT_C_1_DESC.en: Before we can get to Vile, we need to peel away his outer defenses! Take them apart piece by piece, and be thorough! Any mistakes here could cost us the war!

MISSION_COMBAT_C_1_COMPLETION.en: Well done, Commander! Keep going until Vile's soft underbelly is exposed and vulnerable!

MISSION_COMBAT_C1_OBJ1_DESC.en: Take out Vile's Guard Stations, but watch out for their attack!

MISSION_COMBAT_C1_OBJ2_DESC.en: Eliminate Vile's Bunkers! Bring a lot of firepower!

MISSION_COMBAT_C1_OBJ3_DESC.en: Eliminate those Barricades and clear a path for our troops!

MISSION_COMBAT_C_2_INTRO.en: *TCHK* Disco Raptor, this is Papa Bear actual. We are primed and ready for Victor Doomsday Foxtrot on your order, over! *TCHK*

MISSION_COMBAT_C_2_DESC.en: Lieutenant O'Neill has called in the codes for a Doomsday Fire Mission. Target Enemy Units and order the launch at your discretion!

MISSION_COMBAT_C_2_COMPLETION.en: I love the smell of fire in the morning! It smells like victory!

MISSION_COMBAT_C2_OBJ1_DESC.en: Eliminate Enemy Units with the Doomsday Fire Call.

MISSION_COMBAT_C_2_OUTRO.en: *TCHK* Disco Raptor, this is Papa Bear actual. Confirmed, target is burnt toast, over! *TCHK*

MISSION_COMBAT_C_3_DESC.en: Commander, it is imperative that you hold this ground! Lay in some defenses and regroup to fortify your position!

MISSION_COMBAT_C_3_COMPLETION.en: Excellent work. We've survived the day, but the long night is still ahead of us.

MISSION_COMBAT_C3_OBJ1_DESC.en: Purchase Defensive Fire Installations from the Shop.

MISSION_AREA_E_1_INTRO.en: You have liberated the Eastern District! While you've got the Enemy in retreat, take some time to check your fuel supplies.

MISSION_AREA_E_1_DESC.en: Call in some Gasoline Drops to your Drop Zones.

MISSION_AREA_E_1_COMPLETION.en: We're all fueled up and ready to go!

MISSION_AREA_E1_OBJ1_DESC.en: Request Gas Drops by clicking your Drop Zones.

MISSION_AREA_E_2_INTRO.en: Our Allies are requesting support, and we have promised to provide them aid!

MISSION_AREA_E_2_DESC.en: Visit Allied fronts and provide them with whatever help they need!

MISSION_AREA_E_2_COMPLETION.en: Staying on good terms with our Allies is an important part of maintaining the war machine. They'll help us out when we need it.

MISSION_AREA_E2_OBJ1_DESC.en: Attack Enemy Units on your Ally's fronts.

MISSION_AREA_E2_OBJ2_DESC.en: Help your Allies by healing their troops.

MISSION_AREA_E_3_DESC.en: Now is a good time to prepare Supplies for future campaigns. You never know the next time you'll have an opportunity to do so!

MISSION_AREA_E_3_COMPLETION.en: Good, now all we need to do is fill them up.

MISSION_AREA_E3_OBJ1_DESC.en: Buy and place Warehouses in secure locations.

MISSION_AREA_E_4_DESC.en: Helping our population is an important task. We want our nation to be strong for future campaigns!

MISSION_AREA_E_4_COMPLETION.en: Well done, Commander! The nation rejoices!

MISSION_AREA_E4_OBJ1_DESC.en: Provide Supplies to cities of your choice and collect the Cash when time runs out.

MISSION_COMBAT_E_1_INTRO.en: Hello Commander, I am the leader of the Eastern District resistance movement. Glad you're with us!

MISSION_COMBAT_E_1_DESC.en: Our resistance isn't equipped to take out Fierce's Rocket Batteries and we're taking huge losses! Can you help us?

MISSION_COMBAT_E_1_COMPLETION.en: Thank you! Our resistance grows stronger every day, especially now that there are less Rocket Battery support!

MISSION_COMBAT_E1_OBJ1_DESC.en: Take out the Fierce's Rocket Batteries around the region.

MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_INTRO.en: You have no idea how much you're helping the resistance. We can't thank you enough!

MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_INTRO2.en: We've received reports that Enemy APCs are transferring some important Enemy Intel. We don't know what it is, but it must be something big!

MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_DESC.en: Enemy APCs are transferring some important Enemy Intel. You should ambush them and grab the cargo!

MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_COMPLETION.en: You've done it! Let's crack 'em open and see what's inside...

MISSION_COMBAT_E2_OBJ1_DESC.en: Take out the Enemy APCs and see if they're carrying something of importance.

MISSION_COMBAT_E_2_OUTRO.en: Unfortunately there wasn't any Intel, but we did find some of Fierce's blood money and weapons! We must return these to the people!

MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_INTRO.en: Our radio operators have intercepted a garbled enemy transmission!

MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_INTRO2.en: ... *KCH* and your ord*TCHK* attack immediately, do y*TRRRR*...*KCH*

MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_INTRO3.en: Looks like they're planning some kind of attack! We need to get some defenses up fast!

MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_DESC.en: It seems that Fierce is planning a major offensive, and soon! Build some defenses to prepare.

MISSION_COMBAT_E_3_COMPLETION.en: Good work! Hopefully we can hold this ground!

MISSION_COMBAT_E3_OBJ1_DESC.en: Buy and position Defensive Fire Installations to secure the perimeter.

MISSION_COMBAT_E_4_INTRO.en: It's suspiciously quiet near the border... Is it possible they're not coming?

MISSION_COMBAT_E_4_DESC.en: Now that our defenses are up, try taking some of Fierce's territory to lure him into attacking!

MISSION_COMBAT_E_4_COMPLETION.en: Enemy transmissions are going crazy! I think they're coming!

MISSION_COMBAT_E4_OBJ1_DESC.en: Move your troops into Enemy Territory to capture it.

MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_INTRO.en: You are such a pain! Can't you just die already!? ATTAAAACK!

MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_INTRO2.en: That conniving Fierce has secretly sabotaged Eastshire's Supplies and deployed forces on the border! We'll need to deal with both!

MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_DESC.en: Fierce has taken the bait and launched an attack, but he also sabotaged Eastshire's Supplies. Handle his weak military forces while providing Eastshire with fresh Supplies.

MISSION_COMBAT_E_5_COMPLETION.en: You've simultaneously restored Eastshire's Supplies and defeated Fierce's offensive! I bow to you!

MISSION_COMBAT_E5_OBJ2_DESC.en: Click on the city of Eastshire to sell Supplies and receive Cash.

MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_INTRO_1.en: What's this? You dare challenge the great and powerful Commandant Tubman!?\nI will squash you like a bug!

MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_INTRO_2.en: Look who's here. The enemy â€œCommandantâ€ Tubman! He's all smoke and mirrors!

MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_INTRO_3.en: Ok, listen up Commander. Here's your first Strategic Goal â€“ It's a top secret assignment just for you and needs your utmost attention!

MISSION_CAMPAIGN_S_1_DESC.en: With our breakthrough, Its time to strike at the heart of the region. Commander, your mission is to secure and liberate the city of Southgate and it's surroundings!

CAMPAIGN_S_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_1.en: Don't get too comfortable there. My troops will soon drive you straight into the sea!

CAMPAIGN_S_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.en: Is this real life? This can't be happening! You just wait until my cousin hears about this!

CAMPAIGN_S_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_3.en: Aargh! What is this!? Troops... troops! Help!

CAMPAIGN_S_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.en: You are starting to get on my nerves, vermin! Turn back now and I may let you live.

CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_1.en: Outstanding work, soldier! You've done your country proud!

CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_2.en: I... (sniffle) ...I can't believe this! Please don't tell my superiors that I cried.

CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_3.en: Tubman, get a grip of yourself and counter-attack! And I'll be seeing you soon, Commander...

CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_4.en: Your time will come soon Viceroy Vile, and you'll pay for what you did to our country!

CAMPAIGN_S_1_COMPLETION_5.en: Go play with the rest of your sheep, Bragg. I've got better things to do than banter with you.

MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SW_1_INTRO.en: Fresh lambs for the slaughter, I see! I will break you like a twig! BWAHAHA!

MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SW_1_DESC.en: He may be insane, but Chief McDuff is still a clever tactician and a ruthless soldier. Your mission is to free Westbay from his maniacal grasp at any cost!

MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SW_1_OBJECTIVE_4.en: Destroy the Enemy Secret Police HQ

CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_1.en: Bah, land means nothing to me! Our Benevolent Comrade Vile has more!

CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.en: You think you've hurt me? Don't make me laugh! BWAHAHA!

CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_3.en: Have your little city back! I want to see them cry while I destroy you!

CAMPAIGN_SW_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.en: You think you have won!? Your day will come soon and it ain't gonna be about tweetie birds and sunshine!

CAMPAIGN_SW_1_COMPLETION_1.en: Take that, you criminal! Justice prevails in Westbay!

CAMPAIGN_SW_1_COMPLETION_2.en: Come over here and say that, Bragg!

CAMPAIGN_SW_1_COMPLETION_3.en: McDuff, go regroup and stop embarrassing yourself. As for you, Bragg, I won't underestimate your little hero next time. That is all.

CAMPAIGN_SW_1_COMPLETION_4.en: We've got you on the run, Vile! I can't wait to get my hands on you!

MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SE_1_INTRO.en: You're here already? I wish Viceroy Vile would have sent one more division, but this'll have to do.

MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SE_1_INTRO2.en: Thank you for going to the aid of our eastern lands. The citizens must be liberated and given their old lives back!

MISSION_CAMPAIGN_SE_1_DESC.en: The Eastern Coast is occupied by troops under Colonel Stark. He's a brilliant and experienced soldier, so find his weakness and hit him hard before he can retaliate!

CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_1.en: Well played. That was not the move I expected from you.

CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.en: If I had been given more units, this may have turned out differently...

CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_3.en: You have taken the city, forcing me into a strategic retreat. However, don't think you've won yet!

CAMPAIGN_SE_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.en: Checkmate. You have bested me fairly. I concede.

CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_1.en: Your troops were well deployed, with adequate resources and leadership. I commend you.

CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_2.en: You put up a good fight, Stark, but it's time to step aside.

CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_6.en: There's nothing to betray when one has always worn blue underneath, my dear "Benevolent Comrade". Besides, there are true traitors amongst you!

CAMPAIGN_SE_1_COMPLETION_8.en: Plots within plots eh, Colonel Stark? Good to have you on our side! Please report for a full debriefing on enemy Intel.

MISSION_CAMPAIGN_W_1_INTRO.en: Are you ready to die!? I won't go easy on you this time!

MISSION_CAMPAIGN_W_1_DESC.en: Chief McDuff has built up defenses around the city of Westford. Let's take him down for good this time!

CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_1.en: Come on and fight me, you coward!!

CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.en: I've got plenty more where those came from! I'll do whatever it takes to make you bleed!

CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_3.en: Stop moving around, you little thief!

CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.en: Those pesky civilians are nothing but trouble. Vile should have let me handle them as I planned!

CAMPAIGN_W_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_5.en: You insolent little punk! You will pay for this!

CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_1.en: You think that you have gained anything? These lands have nothing!

CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_2.en: We fight for the people, McDuff. That's what will always separate us from criminals like you!

CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_3.en: Do your precious people appreciate how your invasion has destroyed their lands? Who's the enemy here? BWAHAHA!

CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_4.en: Lives will always rebuild, once freed from the shackles of tyranny!

CAMPAIGN_W_1_COMPLETION_5.en: You're too late, Bragg. The avalanche has already begun and your forces are but pebbles in the way of our domination.

MISSION_CAMPAIGN_C_1_INTRO.en: So you have finally arrived. Prepare to meet your end, for it shall be swift.

MISSION_CAMPAIGN_C_1_DESC.en: This is the moment we've been waiting for! There's heavy defense perimeter protecting the capital city, Metropol C.D. Keep your eyes open, and let's hammer the nail in Vile's coffin!

MISSION_CAMPAIGN_C_1_OBJECTIVE_3.en: Liberate the city of Metropol C.D.

MISSION_CAMPAIGN_C_1_OBJECTIVE_4.en: Destroy the Enemy Secret Police HQ

CAMPAIGN_C_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_1.en: You dare insult me!? You have no idea who you're dealing with!

CAMPAIGN_C_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.en: Don't stop now! You are playing right into my hands...

CAMPAIGN_C_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_3.en: Repent for your aggressions against me and I may show you some measure of mercy. On the other hand, I may not...

CAMPAIGN_C_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.en: In time, you will come to see that bowing at my feet is inevitable. Until then, have your minuscule victory.

CAMPAIGN_C_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_5.en: You have determination, commander. Will it be enough to stand against the true might of the Crimson Empire? We shall see...

CAMPAIGN_C_1_COMPLETION_1.en: You've set back my plans, but this was just the tip of the bullet.

CAMPAIGN_C_1_COMPLETION_2.en: Admit defeat, Vile. We're overtaking your forces at every front!

CAMPAIGN_C_1_COMPLETION_3.en: You've lost the game before you even realized what you were playing, old man!

CAMPAIGN_C_1_COMPLETION_4.en: You think this is our whole army? I want to see your faces when you realize what's coming for you over those mountains...

CAMPAIGN_C_1_COMPLETION_5.en: We've done well here, but it looks like Vile is far from finished. We need to prepare for whatever the Crimson Empire has in store for us!

MISSION_CAMPAIGN_E_1_INTRO.en: You're here already? What a bother! Troops, take care of these pests for me!

MISSION_CAMPAIGN_E_1_DESC.en: Governor James Fierce is occupying the city of Eastshire and it's fertile lands. He betrayed our Homeland by opening doors to the enemy! He's no military leader, but he's crafty and not to be underestimated.

CAMPAIGN_E_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_1.en: You took out my republican guard! How can I travel safely to my mansion from now on?

CAMPAIGN_E_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_2.en: How dare you mess with my troops! What a nuisance!

CAMPAIGN_E_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_3.en: I would have stopped you, but I was eating lunch. You got lucky, this time!

CAMPAIGN_E_1_MISSION_COMPLETION_4.en: I'm not getting paid enough for this!

CAMPAIGN_E_1_COMPLETION_1.en: Fine, take it! It's honestly not worth my time.

CAMPAIGN_E_1_COMPLETION_2.en: Begone, Crimson scum! Military force will never overcome the power and spirit of the people!

CAMPAIGN_E_1_COMPLETION_4.en: Hardly! Don't worry about me General, I always hedge my bets.

CAMPAIGN_E_1_COMPLETION_5.en: You are a disappointment, Fierce. Please explain why I should let you live.

SITREP_WELCOME.en: Good to have you back, we have a situation here - %0U\nAlso %1U

SITREP_WELCOME2.en: Back in the nick of time Commander!\n%U

SITREP_ENEMY_ACTIVE.en: %U Enemy Units are about to attack!

SITREP_NEW_ENEMY.en: intel saw %U new Enemy Units at the border!

SITREP_FRIENDLY_DOWN.en: %U Friendly Units are wounded and sent medevac calls.

SITREP_READY_SUPPLIES.en: %U Drop Zones, Cities and Buildings have production ready for collection.

MENU_DESC_OUT_OF_CASH.en: Commander, you seem to need more Cash. You may acquire more Cash by selling Supplies in the liberated cities.

MENU_DESC_OUT_OF_SUPPLIES.en: - Buy Drop Zones from the Shop\n- Click on a Drop Zone to order Supply\n- Or just buy Supply Packs from the shop

MENU_DESC_OUT_OF_PREMIUM.en: Commander, you need more Facebook Credits to buy this item.

MENU_DESC_OUT_OF_INTEL.en: You need %U Intel items to buy this area.\n\nIntel is dropped by Enemy Units and some Enemy Buildings.

MENU_DESC_CONFIRM_SELLING.en: Are you sure you want to sell "%0U" for %1U cash?

MENU_DESC_SUPPLY_CAP.en: Commander, your Supply Storage is filling up. Access the Shop to buy more Storage space to collect more Supplies.

MENU_DESC_UNIT_CAP.en: You have reached the maximum Infantry Unit Capacity.\nConstruct HQs, Boot Camps or Commando Schools to increase the Unit Capacity.

MENU_DESC_UNIT_MECHANIZED.en: You have reached the maximum Mechanized Unit Capacity.\n\nConstruct Motor Pools or Factories to increase the Mechanized Unit Capacity and get more units!

MENU_DESC_UNIT_ARTILLERY.en: You have reached the maximum Artillery Unit Capacity.\n\nConstruct Arsenals or Test Sites to increase the Artillery Unit Capacity and get more units!

MENU_DESC_SERVER_ERROR.en: Your connection with HQ has been lost. Attempting to reconnect.

MENU_DESC_UNLOCK_ITEM_LEVEL.en: Reach level %U to unlock this item.

MENU_DESC_UNLOCK_ITEM_MISSION.en: Progress in the game and missions to unlock this item.

MENU_DESC_UNLOCK_ITEM_NEIGHBORS.en: You need to have %U allies to unlock this item.

MENU_DESC_ASK_SUPPLIES.en: Ask your Allies to send Supply Drops!

RANK_POPUP_DESCRIPTION.en: Receive more medals and conquer more land to earn the next rank

DAILY_REWARD_DESC.en: Come back tomorrow for more rewards!

TUTORIAL_GIVE_FREE_ENERGY_PACK.en: Commander, it looks like you're out of energy. The supply battalion sent you some, so go find it in your ITEMS inventory.

COLLECTION_TRADED_IN_DESC.en: Congratulations! You just traded in the %U.

TOOLTIP_HUD_VISITING_ENERGY.en: Social Energy\nIndicates the number of actions you can carry out at your Ally's front.

TOOLTIP_HUD_HONOR.en: Honor\nGain Honor levels by helping your Ally!

TOOLTIP_HUD_ENERGY.en: Your Energy. Most actions consume one energy.

TOOLTIP_HUD_ARTILLERY_CAP.en: Number of your artillery units. Build Arsenal or Test site to expand the limit.

TOOLTIP_HUD_INFANTRY_CAP.en: Number of your Infantry Units. Build Boot Camps and Commando Schools to expand the limit.

TOOLTIP_HUD_TANK_CAP.en: Number of your vehicle units. Build Motor Pools and Factories to expand the limit.

TOOLTIP_HUD_SUPPLIES.en: Your current supplies, and the supply storage capacity

TOOLTIP_HUD_CANCEL_BUTTON.en: Cancel all actions and sell or move mode

SOMETHING_WENT_WRONG.en: Something went wrong. Please don't try again.

INBOX_NO_REQUESTS_DESCRIPTION.en: You have no pending Ally Requests. Add more Allies now!

INBOX_NO_GIFTS_DESCRIPTION.en: You have no pending gift requests. Send some gifts to your Allies and you'll receive some for sure!

INBOX_GIFT_DESCRIPTION.en: Take this %U and use it well!

GIFTING_REQUEST_TRY_GAME.en: Try out this awesome game pls!

LANDING_BRAGG_DESC.en: %U appreciates the support! Remember, the tides of war are easily turned with the help of allies and what goes around comes around. Your reward awaits!

NEIGHBORS_ACCEPT_NOTIFICATION.en: Alliance formed with %U. Find your Allies in the Ally tab and start a joint op!

GIFTING_ACCEPT_TRY_GAME.en: At ease, Private. I put %0U into your supplies. Join the war and use the given asset well in %1U! We need you!

NEIGHBORS_REMINDER.en: Hey! Please be my ally in Army Attack! - http://apps.facebook.com/armyattack/

LANDING_MISSION_COMPLETED_DESC.en: Ally reports are used to call powerful fire missions.

LANDING_MEDIC_DESC.en: You received %REWARD_AMOUNT Supplies as reward. Help your Ally at their front!

LANDING_ENERGY_DESC.en: Find the Energy Pack in your Item Slot.

LANDING_SUPPLY_DESC.en: By helping your ally, you both get supplies!

LANDING_WISHLIST_DESC.en: Check Ally's wishlist from the friend bar and help him!

LANDING_DAILYBONUS_DESC.en: Use this %REWARD_AMOUNT Cash well! Go and make me proud of you!

LANDING_COLLECTION_TRADED_DESC.en: You get bigger rewards by completing your own collections!

LANDING_FRIEND_ACTION_DESC.en: Visit your ally and support the blue force!

LANDING_HONOR_DESC.en: You gain honor by helping out your allies.

NEW_USER_LANDING_TEXT.en: Listen up, soldier! Crimson Empire has started cowardly offensive against our population...\n\nWe need you to the field ASAP! Just remember your training and you'll do just fine!

FEED_REQUEST_PARTS_DESC.en: Your Allies can help you by clicking on the feed.

FEED_REQUEST_GENERIC.en: I'm in need of %ITEM for my %REASON

FEED_REQUEST_HQ_HAT.en: I'm building a %REASON, but my engineers don't have enough %ITEMs here... Please send some!

FEED_REQUEST_HQ_GENERIC.en: Requesting %ITEM in order to reinforce my Headquarters, over.

FEED_REQUEST_BOOTCAMP_GENERIC.en: Help out my troops and send me some %ITEM for the boot camp construction site. We need you!

FEED_REQUEST_MOTORPOOL_CINDERBLOCK.en: Requesting help with Motor Pool construction! %ITEM needed!

FEED_REQUEST_MOTORPOOL_WIRING.en: To keep those APCs running, I need some %ITEM for my Motor Pool! Could you send me some?

FEED_REQUEST_ARSENAL_ARTILLERYTUBES.en: Send me some %ITEM! Can't build the big guns with out them!

FEED_REQUEST_ARSENAL_LUMBER.en: %ITEM wanted! Can't get my artillery production running without them!

FEED_REQUEST_ARSENAL_WIRING.en: Need electricity for my %REASON. Please send some %ITEM!

FEED_REQUEST_ARSENAL_CINDERBLOCK.en: Can't reinforce my %REASON without any %ITEM... Help needed!

FEED_REQUEST_FACTORY_LUMBER.en: Requesting %ITEM for my Tank Factory. Please help!

FEED_REQUEST_FACTORY_STEELPLATE.en: My tank production is in halt! Send some %ITEM please!

FEED_REQUEST_FACTORY_HARDHAT.en: My workmen need some %ITEMs in order to continue working with my new %FACTORY. Could you send some?

FEED_REQUEST_COMMANDO_COMMANDOKNIFE.en: My %REASON is in need of new %ITEMs! Boys need to carve wood, among other things!

FEED_REQUEST_COMMANDO_LUMBER.en: %ITEM is mainly used for weight training at %REASON, but I'm all out! Please send some!

FEED_REQUEST_TESTSITE_BLACKBOX.en: My missiles won't fly without Hitech %ITEM. Can you support me with some?

FEED_REQUEST_TESTSITE_GENERIC.en: Requesting help with %REASON! Some %ITEM required, over.

FEED_REQUEST_TESTSITE_ARTILLERYTUBE.en: Can you send me some %ITEM for my %REASON?

FEED_REQUEST_OUT_OF_INTEL.en: Requesting Intel on enemy positions, over!

FEED_REQUEST_ALLY_REPORT.en: Keep the Ally Reports coming. They are vital to our success!

FEED_ENERGY_TEXT.en: %NAME needs more Energy to turn the tides of battle! Send %NAME some Energy and claim a reward for yourself!

FEED_MEDALS_TEXT.en: %NAME has once again been rewarded with Medals for heroic actions on the battlefield, and wants to pass them on to you! Let %NAME honor you with a Medal!

FEED_REQUEST_NEWMAP_TEXT.en: My troops are taking the fight into enemy territory! Join me in the fight for freedom!

FEED_INTEL_REQUEST_TEXT.en: Help %NAME and you'll receive Intel in return!

FEED_INVITE_TEXT.en: %NAME has started playing Army Attack and wants you to join the battle as an Ally.

FEED_BUILDINGITEM_TEXT.en: %NAME needs Building Items to finish important military structures! Send a Building Item and get one in return!

FEED_SUPPLY_REQUEST_TITLE.en: %NAME is in desperate need of Supplies!

FEED_SUPPLY_REQUEST_TEXT.en: %NAME is running dangerously low on Supplies! Send %NAME Supplies and you will be rewarded!

FEED_LEVELUP_TITLE.en: %NAME is leveling up! Congratulate and receive %REWARD_AMOUNT %REWARD_NAME.

FEED_LEVELUP_TEXT.en: %NAME has been recognized for outstanding excellence in the field and wants to share the wealth! Collect %REWARD_AMOUNT %REWARD_NAME!

FEED_HONOR_TEXT.en: The honor of %NAME is rising since he is helping his allies to win the war!

FEED_MISSIONCOMPLETE_TEXT.en: %NAME completed a mission and is sharing the rewards!

FEED_MEDIC_TEXT.en: %NAME has troops that need your help! Take these supplies and go to his front to help the downed unit!

FEED_FRIENDACTION_TITLE.en: Together we stand, divided we fall

FEED_FRIENDACTION_TEXT.en: Our alliance joint operation was a great success. Supporting the blue force gives supplies and energy!

FEED_WISHLIST_TEXT.en: %NAME needs %U. All donations welcome, please help.

FEED_DAILY_BONUS_TEXT.en: Good soldiers like %NAME are rewarded for their efforts in the war. Be one and claim your reward!

FEED_COLLECTION_TRADED_TEXT.en: %NAME has found the missing piece in his %U collection.
