MISSION_BUILD_HQ2_DESC.en: The foundations are laid down. Finish up the HQ so we can increase our unit capacity, unlock more defenses and Boot Camp.

MISSION_BUILD_HQ3_DESC.en: Now that you've set up a base camp, we can deploy more units. Get some more Infantry out on the field!

MISSION_BUILD_BOOTCAMP1_DESC.en: Military buildings increase our capacity to have larger forces. Set up a Boot Camp so we can get some more Infantry out there!

MISSION_BUILD_BOOTCAMP2_DESC.en: Our first recruits have just arrived! Finish up the Boot Camp so we can train and deploy them!

MISSION_BUILD_BOOTCAMP3_DESC.en: Now that the Boot Camp is ready, deploy some new Infantry units to join the fight!

MISSION_BUILD_MOTORPOOL1_DESC.en: Let's get some APCs out there â€“ they move fast and take a lot of punishment. First you're gonna need to set up a Motor Pool.

MISSION_BUILD_MOTORPOOL2_DESC.en: Finish up that Motor Pool so we can begin fielding APCs. Our troops need the support!

MISSION_BUILD_MOTORPOOL3_DESC.en: The Motor Pool is good to go. Deploy an APC and watch 'em run!

MISSION_BUILD_ARSENAL1_DESC.en: Mobile Artillery units will give our troops the heavy fire support they need. First you're gonna need to set up an Arsenal.

MISSION_BUILD_ARSENAL2_DESC.en: Get that Arsenal fully operation so we can rain terror down on the enemy from above!

MISSION_BUILD_ARSENAL3_DESC.en: Now we're talking firepower! Deploy one of those bad boys and watch the land shake once it starts hammering!

MISSION_BUILD_FACTORY1_DESC.en: Battle Tanks are the ultimate weapon we need to turn the tides! Set up a Factory so we can deploy these instruments of destruction.

MISSION_BUILD_FACTORY2_DESC.en: Good work, soldier. The foundations are in place. Now finish up that Factory so we can bring the hurt.

MISSION_BUILD_FACTORY3_DESC.en: Now that the Factory is good to go, deploy a Battle Tank and watch the enemy units melt!

MISSION_BUILD_COMMANDO1_DESC.en: Commando can move without enemy interference and give us the tactical edge we need. Set up a Commando School!

MISSION_BUILD_COMMANDO2_DESC.en: Complete the Commando School so we can field our elite soldiers!

MISSION_BUILD_COMMANDO3_DESC.en: The Commando School has honed recruits into perfect physical and mental weapons. Get them deployed so we can strike the enemy where it hurts the most!

MISSION_BUILD_TESTSITE1_DESC.en: Let's get some Rocket Battery units out there to really bring the pain. You need to set up a Test Site first!

MISSION_BUILD_TESTSITE2_DESC.en: The engineers are ready to get to work. Finish up the Test Site so we can crank out those Rocket Batteries!

MISSION_BUILD_TESTSITE3_DESC.en: Get one of those Rocket Battery units deployed and let's see what our engineers have cooked up!

MISSION_BUILD_HQ2_COMPLETION.en: Great! HQ increases our Unit Capacity and allows us to build a Boot Camp along with new Defenses.

MISSION_BUILD_HQ3_COMPLETION.en: We're gonna need all the troops we can muster! More buildings means you can support and deploy more units.

MISSION_BUILD_BOOTCAMP1_COMPLETION.en: Good work, soldier. Now finish up that Boot Camp before we get outnumbered!

MISSION_BUILD_BOOTCAMP2_COMPLETION.en: Nicely done! We've got a whole mess of recruits looking to see some action!

MISSION_BUILD_BOOTCAMP3_COMPLETION.en: It's good to see fresh faces, eager to get their hands dirty!

MISSION_BUILD_MOTORPOOL1_COMPLETION.en: Good job, soldier. Now finish up that Motor Pool so we can deploy those APCs.

MISSION_BUILD_MOTORPOOL2_COMPLETION.en: Well done! The enemy won't know what hit 'em!

MISSION_BUILD_MOTORPOOL3_COMPLETION.en: Great work, soldier. Send that APC charging in and we'll catch the enemy with their pants down!

MISSION_BUILD_ARSENAL1_COMPLETION.en: Outstanding work, soldier. Finish up that Arsenal so we can finally get some Artillery on the field!

MISSION_BUILD_ARSENAL2_COMPLETION.en: The Arsenal is good to go! Get those Artillery units deployed!

MISSION_BUILD_ARSENAL3_COMPLETION.en: Positioning is key! Make sure the Artillery units are within range to shower the enemy with fire.

MISSION_BUILD_FACTORY1_COMPLETION.en: The groundwork has been laid, but there's still some work to be done before we can produce Battle Tanks.

MISSION_BUILD_FACTORY2_COMPLETION.en: If you want big weapons, you gotta have a big building!

MISSION_BUILD_FACTORY3_COMPLETION.en: Can you feel the ground trembling? Our first Battle Tank was just finished!

MISSION_BUILD_COMMANDO1_COMPLETION.en: This Commando School will train only the best of the best recruits, but not until it's finished! Get to it, soldier!

MISSION_BUILD_COMMANDO2_COMPLETION.en: The Commando School is complete, so let's train our first elite unit!

MISSION_BUILD_COMMANDO3_COMPLETION.en: Oorah! Commando units are lethal and resourceful weapons. I'm glad these guys are on our side!

MISSION_BUILD_TESTSITE1_COMPLETION.en: The foundations are laid, but it's going to need to be a lot sturdier than that.

MISSION_BUILD_TESTSITE2_COMPLETION.en: The engineers have gotten to work. You can tell by the sounds of explosions coming from inside!

MISSION_BUILD_TESTSITE3_COMPLETION.en: The Rocket Battery is a perfectly engineered destruction machine. Let's show the enemies our new toy!

MISSION_COMMANDO_INTRO.en: Commander, I've been informed you've acquired your first Commando Unit. I've got just the mission for you to test them out!

MISSION_COMMANDO_DESC.en: Commandos are elite units that can move through Enemy Units and operate quickly behind lines. Use your Commandos to strike Enemy Units!

MISSION_COMMANDO_OBJ1.en: Use your Commando Units to quickly take out Enemy Units.

MISSION_COMMANDO_COMPLETION.en: Those Commandos are a deadly blade in the hands of the right leader.

MISSION_MOTORPOOL_INTRO.en: Good work! Let's give that APC a spin and take out some Enemy Units while you're at it!

MISSION_MOTORPOOL_DESC.en: APCs are fast and agile, covering great distances faster than regular Infantry Units. They can also take quite a beating!

MISSION_MOTORPOOL_OBJ1.en: Order your APC to eliminate Enemy Units.

MISSION_MOTORPOOL_COMPLETION.en: Those APCs move fast and hit hard!

MISSION_ARSENAL_INTRO.en: Artillery can really deliver punishment from a distance, but they can't take many hits. Use them wisely!

MISSION_ARSENAL_DESC.en: Artillery works best when firing from a safe position, attacking troops from a distance.

MISSION_ARSENAL_OBJ1.en: Order Artillery strikes to take out Enemy Units.

MISSION_ARSENAL_COMPLETION.en: Artillery is a powerful tool for establishing control of the field. Make sure they're well protected!

MISSION_FACTORY_INTRO.en: Battle Tanks are the armored fist of your army! They pack a punch where needed and leave ruin in their wake!

MISSION_FACTORY_DESC.en: Battle Tanks are rough, tough, and ready to rumble! They're strong enough to use individually or as part of a larger attack.

MISSION_FACTORY_OBJ1.en: Order your Battle Tank to take out Enemy Units.

MISSION_FACTORY_COMPLETION.en: Mow 'em down and watch them run!

MISSION_TESTSITE_INTRO.en: Mobile Rocket Batteries are faster than Artillery and pack more heat. Time to kick some Crimson butt!

MISSION_TESTSITE_DESC.en: Mobile Rocket Batteries can lay down some serious barrage on Enemy Units. Get in close, but make sure they're firing from a safe place!

MISSION_TESTSITE_OBJ1.en: Order your Mobile Rocket Batteries to take out Enemy Units.

BUNDLE_DESC.en: Finish the building with this bundle of various items.

MONEY_DISCLAIMER.en: Notice that the more you buy, the less you pay!

INVITE_FRIENDS_DESC.en: Fun is like a Fine beverage - it is rarely enjoyable alone.\n\nJoin forces with your friends and let no one hold you back!

FLASH_REQUIREMENTS_DESCRIPTION.en: To play %0U, you need have the latest Adobe Flash Player installed (%1U or better)! Get it here: http://get.adobe.com/flashplayer/

ERROR_2100.en: We can't find the feed you clicked! No worries though, it's probably found in a moment. Try again later please!

ERROR_2101.en: Sorry, seems like the feed you clicked is expired.

ERROR_2102.en: Sorry, but you're just bit too late and the rewards have ran out. Please try another feed!

ERROR_2103.en: Seems like you have already clicked this feed previously. Try clicking on another feed, soldier!

ERROR_2069.en: Hey hey hey! Soldier, you can't click on your own request! Try telling your allies to do that instead!

ERROR_2080.en: Seems like you have done this action already... But keep on playing as there's more coming!

ERROR_2067.en: We can't find the request you clicked! No worries though, it's probably found in a moment. Try again later please!

WITHERED_FRIEND_DESC.en: The Enemy is cunning and will sabotage your Supplies if you don't collect them fast enough. You can ask your Allies to FIX them though!

WITHERED_FEED_DESC.en: Assistance needed! Come to my front and fix my sabotaged Supplies! You'll be rewarded!

WITHERED_LANDING_DESC.en: Go to your Ally's front and recover some Supplies!

RANK_NEW_RANK.en: Congratulations! You have earned a new rank!

LEVEL_UP_ENERGY_FEED_DESC.en: %NAME is now level %LEVEL in Army Attack. Play Army Attack on android to battle against enemies and recapture your cities now!

LEVEL_UP_ENERGY_LANDING_DESC.en: You can use energy packs from your inventory!

MISSION_REPORT_FEED_DESC.en: %NAME has completed %MISSION_ID mission in Army Attack. Play Army Attack on android to battle against enemies and recapture your cities now!

MISSION_REPORT_LANDING_DESC.en: Use Ally Reports to call Fire Missions

RANK_FEED_TEXT.en: Due selfless and heroic efforts in the battlefield, %NAME has been given a rank of %RANK. Get your own medals from here too!

RANK_LANDING_TEXT.en: Use medals to earn new ranks!

CAMPAIGN1_SE_AIRPORT_INTRO1.en: Commander, we have a situation at hand regarding our small neighboring country, Libery.

CAMPAIGN1_SE_AIRPORT_INTRO2.en: All communication to the island has been cut out.

CAMPAIGN1_SE_AIRPORT_INTRO3.en: Our Satellite Surveillance indicates heavy enemy presence in the area.

CAMPAIGN1_SE_AIRPORT_INTRO4.en: Initial scans also show one big unidentified structure. This looks serious!

CAMPAIGN1_SE_AIRPORT_INTRO5.en: We need you to start preparing for a possible response regarding the situation.

CAMPAIGN1_SE_AIRPORT_INTRO6.en: I have unlocked the Airbase from the shop. Start by building it!

CAMPAIGN1_SE_AIRPORT_COMPLETION_AIRPORT.en: Well Done! You can now access the World Map!

CAMPAIGN1_SE_AIRPORT_OUTRO1.en: Well done Commander!  Airbase is ready and functional!

CAMPAIGN1_SE_AIRPORT_OUTRO2.en: It seems that Viceroy Vile has some shady business in Libery.

CAMPAIGN1_SE_AIRPORT_OUTRO3.en: We should start preparing for Operation Desert Scorpion.

CAMPAIGN1_SE_AIRPORT_OUTRO4.en: Commander, our intelligence is working hard to gather more information from Libery. But we still need more time.

CAMPAIGN1_SE_AIRPORT_OUTRO5.en: While waiting, access the map screen and check out the location for the upcoming operation.

CAMPAIGN1_SE_AIRPORT_OBJECTIVE2_DESC.en: Click the building site to build!

CAMPAIGN1_SE_AIRPORT_OBJECTIVE3_DESC.en: Get items and finish the building!

LEVELUP_POPUP_TITLE.en: You have reached a new level!

DAILY_REWARD_DESC_2.en: Come back tomorrow and win one of these items:

DAILY_REWARD_SELECTION_DESC.en: And share rest of items with your friends!

DESERT_TEASER_DESC.en: Get ready for Operation Desert Scorpion\n- The first map expansion -

LANDING_DAILYBONUS_DESC_NEW.en: Here's a gift for you from your friend!

BUILDING_AIRPORT_DESC.en: Allows you to open the World Map\n\nSize: 4x4

MATERIAL_PILOTHELMET_DESC.en: Rare item carried by enemy APCs, Battle Tanks, Rocket Batteries and Stormtroopers

TUTORIAL_MAPICON_DESC.en: Travel to new areas â€“ Click on the Map icon to enter the World Map!

MISSION_HINT_TEXT_AIRBASE.en: HINT: The Airbase allows you to travel to new areas. Share this intel with your allies!

FEED_AIRPORT_READY_TEXT.en: I built an airbase to open up new campaigns! Take this Ally Report and go build your own!

LANDING_AIRPORT_TITLE_DESC.en: Here's an Ally Report for you.

MAP_TOOLTIP_LIBERY_DESC.en: Libery is a peaceful desert island located 3500 miles south of your homeland. It's now under the iron fist of the Crimson Empire!

MAP_TOOLTIP_HOMELAND_DESC.en: Your homeland is under attack by the evil Crimson Empire. This is our main base of operation.

LOST_INFANTRY_DESC.en: A squad of lost infantry. I hope they don't get lost again!

CAMPAIGN1_SE_WP_INTRO1.en: General, what is the status in Libery?

CAMPAIGN1_SE_WP_INTRO2.en: The situation in Libery seems to be escalating rapidly. Black Fox, details please.

CAMPAIGN1_SE_WP_INTRO3.en: Thank you, Sir. The climate of Libery has changed due to some unknown ecological catastrophe.

CAMPAIGN1_SE_WP_INTRO4.en: What do you mean? How has the climate changed?

CAMPAIGN1_SE_WP_INTRO5.en: Itâ€™s as dry as hell, Mrs. President. There's no fresh water at all.Â Additionally our spies are reporting that Viceroy Vile has a new ally there.

CAMPAIGN1_SE_WP_INTRO6.en: It may be that the recent climate change and this unknown ally have some kind of connection.

CAMPAIGN1_SE_WP_INTRO7.en: Commander, we need you to start producing water for Operation Desert Scorpion. Seems like water will be our most precious asset there!

CAMPAIGN1_SE_WP_INTRO8.en: Commander, buy and build a Water Plant and start producing water!

CAMPAIGN1_SE_WP_INTRO9.en: If we control the water, we control the desert. Any action in Libery will consume both energy and water.

CAMPAIGN1_SE_WP_INTRO10.en: Click on the Water Plant to start producing water for Operation Desert Scorpion.

CAMPAIGN2_SE_WP_DESC.en: Start your Water production and collect the Water when production is finished.

CAMPAIGN2_SE_WP_COMPLETION.en: Good work! Keep the production up and running and we'll rule the desert.\nYou can find the rewarded Water Pack in you inventory!

CAMPAIGN1_SE_WP_INTRO11.en: Commander! We intercepted this message between Vile and his new ally! It's partially broken, but you'll get the picture.

CAMPAIGN1_SE_WP_INTRO13.en: Master, we are work*tsk* 24/7 *bzz* launch the End of World weapon on *TSSS*.

CAMPAIGN1_SE_WP_INTRO14.en: Here's the intel gathered so far. Name: Dr. Pravus. Specilization: Evil Contraptions of Mass Destruction. History: Sub-Atomic Physicist, Disappeared 5 years ago. Location: Libery.

CAMPAIGN1_SE_WP_INTRO15.en: I have a feeling that we will meet him soon...

CAMPAIGN1_SE_WP_DESC.en: To be able to operate in desert conditions we need a water production capacity.

CAMPAIGN1_SE_WATERPLANT_OBJECTIVE1_DESC.en: Buy and build a Water Plant to start producing water!

CAMPAIGN1_SE_WATERPLANT_OBJECTIVE2_DESC.en: Click the Water Plant when production is ready to collect the Water.

BUILDING_WATER_PLANT_DESC.en: Produce clean Water for desert operations. Hire friends to work at the Water Plant to boost production!

SHOP_BUILDING_ALREADY_ADDED.en: You can only have 1 and you can only build it in your homeland

HIRE_FRIEND_WP_DESCRIPTION.en: Hire allies to work at the Water Plant to increase production!\nPositions will be filled in order.\nNote! Workers go home when the job is done.

FEED_WATERPLANT_READY_TEXT.en: I built a Water Plant to prepare for the desert campaign! Take this Ally Report and go build your own!

LANDING_WATERPLANT_TITLE_DESC.en: Here's an Ally Report for you.

HELP_REQUEST.en: Urgent! Help me to produce water for my desert operations.

INBOX_HELP_REQUEST_NAME.en: Join my Water Plant staff to boost production.

AUTHINFO_CAPTION.en: By providing us with these permissions, we will create a fun and exciting social environment for you and your friends. This information is not delivered to 3rd parties.

AUTHINFO_BASIC_DESC.en: Your name and photo are used to make link between you and your friends.

AUTHINFO_EMAIL_DESC.en: With email we communicate updates on social interactions, such as new neighbors, gifts and invites, as well as new amazing content for the game.

AUTHINFO_PROFILE_DESC.en: We need to know your birthday to ensure you receive content appropriate for your age.

AUTHINFO_PRIVACY.en: Check out our Privacy Policy for more information.

FEED_WATER_REQUEST_TITLE.en: %NAME is in desperate need of Water !

FEED_WATER_REQUEST_TEXT.en: %NAME is running low on Water! Send %NAME Water and you will be rewarded!

LANDING_WATER_DESC.en: By helping your ally, you both get Water!

POP_UP_WATER_DESC.en: You can get more water from Allies, producing some at the Water Plant or by buying packs from the Shop

BUTTON_REDEPLOY_TOOL_TOOLTIP.en: Place units to inventory for redeployment

POP_UP_REDEPLOY.en: Do you want to place this unit to the inventory? You can later redeploy the unit from the inventory.\n\nRedeployment cost: %U supplies.

POP_UP_CANNOT_REDEPLOY.en: The unit is damaged. You must heal the unit first to be able to redeploy it.

MAP_TOOLTIP_LIBERY_LOCKED.en:
Requires:
Build the Water Plant and collect Water to unlock!

Libery is a peaceful desert island located 3500 miles south of your homeland. It's now under the iron fist of the Crimson Empire!

CAMPAIGN1_SE_WP_INTRO16.en: Commander, we now have everything we need to access the desert. Open the map and go!

MISSION_D_S_DIAL1.en: Welcome to Libery, Commander. The President wants to speak with you.

MISSION_D_S_DIAL2.en: Commander! This is a very important operation. The Crimson Empire has occupied peaceful Libery. Itâ€™s our duty to help our friends.

MISSION_D_S_DIAL3.en: We also have some concerning intel suggesting that the Crimson Empire may have bigger plans going on here.

MISSION_D_S_DIAL4.en: Thatâ€™s correct. Commander, you must act fast. In addition the enemy already knows that we are here.

MISSION_D_S_DIAL5.en: What is this! Intruders! Tubman, stop loitering and do something! I donâ€™t need any distractions now.

MISSION_D_S_DIAL6.en: Aah, Commander. We meet again. You better not ruin my holiday!

MISSION_D_S_DIAL7.en: It's time to find out what is really going on in here.

MISSION_D_S_DIAL8.en: One more thing, Commander. HQ has provided you with one Elite Tank. Use it to gain the initiative.

MISSION_D_S_M1_DESC.en: Clear the vicinity from enemy defensive fortifications

MISSION_D_S_M1_COMPL.en: Good job! Now we have cleared the beach and we are ready to continue inland!

MISSION_D_S_M2_DESC.en: Conquer 5 tiles to gain a better foothold in the region.

MISSION_D_S_M3_DESC.en: Build HQ to increase our infantry unit cap

MISSION_D_S_M3_COMPL.en: Outstanding work. Now we can buy more infantry units!

D_S_M3_OBJECTIVE_DESC.en: Buy the HQ from the shop and finish it

MISSION_D_S_M5_DESC.en: Destroy Fuel Dumps to disturb the enemy supply

MISSION_D_S_M5_COMPL.en: Disturbing the enemy fuel supply gives us an advantage. Well done!

MISSION_D_S_M6_COMPL.en: It is a good idea to take out the enemy snipers fast. Good job.

CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_DESC.en: This is the beginning of our campaign. Do the objectives and investigate the area.

D_S_C1_OBJECTIVE_1_DESC.en: Locate the town of Port Marie and liberate the people

D_S_C1_OBJECTIVE_2_DESC.en: Locate and destroy the southern enemy base

D_S_C1_OBJECTIVE_3_DESC.en: Locate and destroy the Command Bunker

CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_TOWN_DIAL1.en: The townsfolk report that the pipe has brought diseases and famine to the region. We should follow it and trace the source.

CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_TOWN_DIAL2.en: These people have suffered enough. Iâ€™d suggest you to provide them with some supplies.

CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE_DIAL1.en: This was just a minor set back! You will never find the evil weapâ€¦

CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE_DIAL2.en: Silence you stupid soldier! Don't give away our secret!

CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE_DIAL3.en: According to the documents we found from the ruins, the pipe is pumping toxic waste out from some kind of factory. We must hurry and follow the pipe!

CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE2_DIAL2.en: What is this I don't even...

CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE2_DIAL3.en: Tubman, get a grip! Attack Force Desert Sting â€“ engage the enemy!

CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_BASE2_DIAL5.en: Dr. Pravus, you donâ€™t need to worry. He will destroy the enemy and you will have peace to complete your work.

CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_KILL_DIAL1.en: Stop it! I won't cry this time...

CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_1.en: Commander, we just intercepted another message...

CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_2.en: *TSK* Dr. Pravus, what is the estimation when the weapon is functional? *TSSK*

CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_3.en: *TSSK* â€¦won't be long anymore, master. â€œEnd of the Worldâ€ is almost ready and *TSSSSK TSSSK TSS*

CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_4.en: ...the rest is unreadable. Commander, we need to be fast.

CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_5.en: Thatâ€™s correct. In addition we have new information...

CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_6.en: Our agents report that the secret of Libery is a factoryâ€¦

CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_7.en: A factory to produce weapons of mass destruction . It has to be found and destroyed.

CAMPAIGN_D_S_C1_OUTRO_8.en: Buy the map for the middle region from the shop and see how deep the rabbit hole really is.

MISSION_D_S_HORDE_DESC.en: Defend yourself against the enemy strikeforce and destroy them

MISSION_D_S_BUY_MAP_DESC.en: Go to the shop and buy the map of the middle region. You can get Enemy Intel from propaganda towers and enemy units.

MISSION_D_S_BUY_MAP_COMPL.en: New region is open! Attack there and make us proud!

D_S_BUY_MAP_OBJECTIVE_DESC.en: Buy the Map for the region in the north

MISSION_D_S_SUPPLY_DESC.en: These people have suffered enough. Provide them with supplies.

MISSION_D_S_SUPPLY_COMPL.en: It is important to keep the civilians happy. Good job!

D_S_OBJECTIVE_SUPPLY_DESC.en: Click on a town and provide any amount of supplies

MISSION_D_M_DIAL1.en: The intel we collected suggests that the weapon is almost ready. Follow the pipe and destroy the factory!

MISSION_D_M_DIAL2.en: Buahaha, but you can only try! You shall not pass!

MISSION_D_M_DIAL3.en: Boys, remember what we talked and trained.

MISSION_D_M_DIAL6.en: Of course... they have no chance!

CAMPAIGN_D_M_C1_DESC.en: Let's make sure that Doomsday won't come after all.

D_M_C1_OBJECTIVE_1_DESC.en: Locate the Doomsday Device and destroy it

D_M_C1_OBJECTIVE_2_DESC.en: Locate and destroy the western Battle Fortress

D_M_C1_OBJECTIVE_3_DESC.en: Locate the town of Sandberg and liberate the people

D_M_C1_OBJECTIVE_4_DESC.en: Locate the town of Wind Cove and liberate the people

MISSION_D_M_1_COMPL.en: Good job cutting down those tanks, Commander.

MISSION_D_M_2_DESC.en: The people want to thank you for the supplies. Collect the money!

MISSION_D_M_2_COMPL.en: Keep up the good work, Commander.

D_M_M_2_OBJECTIVE_DESC.en: Collect money from  a supplied town

D_M_HORDE1_DIAL_PRE.en: AARRRGGHHH. The city is lost, but I'll bring in the big guns. You'll never make out of here alive!

D_M_HORDE1_DIAL.en: My beautiful army! Not fair! Mamaaaaa!

MISSION_D_M_HORDE_2_DESC.en: Destroy the support artillery enemy sent.

MISSION_D_M_MAP_DESC.en: Go the shop and buy the map of the last region.

MISSION_D_M_MAP_COMPL.en: The last region is open. It's time to move in!

D_M_MAP_OBJECTIVE_DESC.en: Buy the last map of Libery from the shop

C_1_D_M_TOWN_DIAL1.en: Fine... You can keep the civilians, but you will never catch me!

C_1_D_M_TOWN_DIAL2.en: No, but I will catch you. You have failed me for the last time, Tubman.

C_1_D_M_BATTLEFORT_DIAL2.en: McDuff... Don't make me come there and stop them myself.

C_1_D_M_DOOM_DIAL1.en: All this work... fades away... like tears in rain... what can I doâ€¦

C_1_D_M_DOOM_DIAL2.en: My precious Doomsday Device, my dear Dee Deeâ€¦ destroyedâ€¦

C_1_D_M_DOOM_DIAL3.en: Pravus, pull yourself together! Time to execute â€Plan Bâ€!

C_1_D_M_DOOM_DIAL4.en: Retreat to the Strongpoint! Your lab is up and running here. I'll sent more troops in!

D_M_OUTRO_DIAL1.en: The Doomsday Device is destroyed, but unfortunately the enemy slipped through our hands.

D_M_OUTRO_DIAL2.en: Commander, there is someone who wants to thank you.

D_M_OUTRO_DIAL3.en: Good job! What we do in life, echoes in eternity!

D_M_OUTRO_DIAL4.en: Mrs. President, this is not over yet. Viceroy Vile and Dr. Pravus escaped to the northern region. I believe that we have a chance to imprison them and end this crazy war.

D_M_OUTRO_DIAL5.en: Buy a map for the new region from the Shop. We must follow them! Their bad deeds cannot go unpunished.

INTRO_D_N_DIAL_1.en: Here's the intel so far: The enemy has a very tough defensive line in this region. Also Viceroy Vile's HQ, called the Strongpoint is located in the northern part of the region.

INTRO_D_N_DIAL_2.en: We have a strong belief that Viceroy and Dr. Pravus have a new evil plan. The intel reports mention leads about something called â€œPlan Bâ€

CAMPAIGN_D_N_C1_DESC.en: This is it, Commander. Finish these objectives and capture the enemy.

DN_C1_OBJECTIVE_1_DESC.en: Locate and destroy Viceroy Vile's Strongpoint

DN_C1_OBJECTIVE_2_DESC.en: Locate and destroy the northern Battle Fortress

DN_C1_OBJECTIVE_3_DESC.en: Locate the town of Dark Beach and liberate the people

MISSION_D_N_1_DESC.en: Disturb the enemy supplychain by destroying some Fuel Dumps

MISSION_D_N_2_COMPL.en: Outstanding! Those Guard Stations are not a problem anymore.

MISSION_D_N_3_COMPL.en: Libery is soon ours! Good job!

D_N_BASE_DIALOG_1.en: Seems like our impenetrable line was penetrable after all. That changes nothing, â€Plan Bâ€ is still active... They will all die like cockroaches!

D_N_BASE_DIALOG_2.en: Commander, we found some documents in the base. Our experts analyzed them and it seems some kind of biological weapon. We must hurry to Viceroy Vileâ€™s Strongpoint!

D_N_TOWN_DIALOG.en: The civilians thank us. Reports tell rumors about people getting sick mysteriously. This might have something to do with the mysterious â€œPlan Bâ€â€¦

D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_1.en: Victory! I'll let our scientists contain this biological substance safely.

D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_2.en: Not again! All my plans... all my designs... ruined!

D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_3.en: You have won this battle, Commander.

D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_4.en: Viceroy Vile, I assume that you will now declare your unconditional surrender. Your plans have failed!

D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_5.en: Really? Well, this is my answerâ€¦

D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_6.en: Where did they disappear? General Bragg! Commander! Black Fox!

D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_7.en: That slimy bastard! Come back and fight like a man!

D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_8.en: Both Viceroy Vile and Dr. Patrus Pravus have escaped.

D_N_STRONGPOINT_OUTRO_9.en: Commander, it seems that this war is not over yet. Viceroy Vile and the evil Crimson Empire are still a threat to the world and humanity. We need to continue our struggle to restore the peace and happiness.

DVILLAGE_DESC.en: The famous harbour town of the southern region. Port Marie is famous for it's delicious fish cuisines.\n\nSupport civilians with Supplies and they will reward you with money!

DTOWN_DESC.en: Little town located south of the Mountains of Libery. It's known for it's annual Festival of Sand.\n\nSupport civilians with Supplies and they will reward you with money!

DCITY1_DESC.en: Libery's second biggest city. It used to be a pirate town back in the days.\n\nSupport civilians with Supplies and they will reward you with money!

DCITY2_DESC.en: Dark Beach is the capital of Libery. It has many famous historical sites.\n\nSupport civilians with Supplies and they will reward you with money!

FEED_DOOMSDAY_DESTR_TEXT.en: I stopped the evil plans of the Crimson Empire for now. Take this Water Pack and prevent the Doomsday.

FEED_STRONGPOINT_DESTR_TITLE.en: We might have won the battle...

FEED_STRONGPOINT_DESTR_TEXT.en: The battle on the desert has been won but the war goes on. Take this Water Pack and free Libery from its oppressors.

LANDING_DOOMSDAY_TITLE_DESC.en: Here's a Water Pack for you.

LANDING_STRONGPOINT_TITLE_DESC.en: Here's a Water Pack for you.

CAMPAIGN2_SE_WP_DESC2.en: Start your Water production by clicking the plant and selecting the production

CAMPAIGN1_SE_WATERPLANT_OBJECTIVE2_DESC2.en: Choose any amount of water to be produced

AUTHINFO_PUBLISH_GAMES_DESC.en: This information is used to make sharing achievements and comparing scores with your friends easier

FREE_UNITS_EXPLANATION.en: Invite NEW allies to get these free Elite Units! You'll get one point on a unit once your friend accepts the ally request. You can invite as many friends as you like!\n\nThe Elite Eliminator awaits!

FREE_UNITS_STATUS_COMPLETED.en: Unit completed and added to your inventory!

FREE_UNITS_STATUS_IN_PROGRESS.en: Invite more allies to complete this unit!

FREE_UNITS_STATUS_LOCKED.en: Complete the above free units to unlock this free unit!

FREE_UNITS_POPUP_DESC.en: Good work, Soldier! Inviting those Allies got you rewarded with free units! You can access them from your inventory!

MYSTERY_CRATE_DESC.en: You don't know what's in until you open it, but it sure will be something good!

BUY_NW_MAP_DESC.en: Go to the shop and buy the North West region map.

INTRO_NW_DIALOG_1.en: Come, Commander... Let the die be cast and come across...

INTRO_NW_DIALOG_2.en: There is only death for your beyond the mountains.

INTRO_NW_DIALOG_4.en: Commander, buy a map from the shop and take us in.

INTRO_NW_DIALOG_5.en: I suggest that you buy the map of the western region first. The defences there are weaker and we should be able to gain the initiative.

NW_C1_DESC.en: The attack has been commenced. Push through the mountains, liberate the city of Wesserness and get rid of any enemy presence.

NW_C1_OBJC_2_DESC.en: Attack and liberate the town of Wesserness

NW_DIALOG_TESLA.en: My equipment! Trashed again! You'll pay for that!

NW_DIALOG_CITY.en: Troops! Commence counter-attack. Conquer the city back, no matter what the cost!

NW_DIALOG_ENEMY1.en: Alpha one and two, come in...

NW_DIALOG_ENEMY2.en: Bravo one, Bravo two? Anyone? Come in, over.

OUTRO_NW_DIALOG_1.en: Pravus, how is our surprise going along?

OUTRO_NW_DIALOG_2.en: My Lord! The defensive shield is up and running and the Droids are operational. Just keep the enemy away from the generator...

OUTRO_NW_DIALOG_3.en: Hmm, that didn't sound good. We need to be careful when advancing to the east. Go to the shop and buy a new map.

BUY_NC_MAP_DESC.en: It is time to buy a new map from the Shop and push towards eastern regions

INTRO_NC_DIALOG_1.en: Let's see how you survive this! PRAVUS! ACTIVATE DROIDS!

INTRO_NC_DIALOG_2.en: At once! Come and meet your maker, Commander

NC_C1_DESC.en: Investigate the Middle Region and find out what those Droids are about. On the way, clear the area of enemies.

NC_C1_OBJC_1_DESC.en: Destroy 15 Droids that are spawning from the weapon

NC_DIALOG_DROIDS.en: You can kill the droids all you want, we have practically infinite reserve of those!

NC_DIALOG_ENEMIES2.en: Prepare yourself, Commander. Vile is coming in with force!

NC_DIALOG_TESLA.en: Why do you always break everything I build?

OUTRO_NC_DIALOG_1.en: We need to disable the shield somehow!

OUTRO_NC_DIALOG_2.en: A shield as powerful as that requires bigger generator. I'm suspecting that it is located in the region to the east!

OUTRO_NC_DIALOG_3.en: You know what to do Commander... Go to the shop and buy the map!

BUY_NE_MAP_DESC.en: Go to the shop and buy the map to the East

BUY_NE_MAP_COMPL.en: Well done, Commander. It's time to disable that generator!

INTRO_NE_DIALOG_1.en: Concentrate your efforts in locating and destroying the generator and keeping the droids down.

INTRO_NE_DIALOG_2.en: Master! They are getting closer the generator. It's the only weak point in the weapon...

INTRO_NE_DIALOG_3.en: Don't worry, they are now battling against our Eastern Army and the Droids. Let them try!

NE_C1_DESC.en: Destroy the Power Generator to disable the Railgun shield, allowing a direct attack.

NE_C1_OBJC_1_DESC.en: Locate the Generator from the Eastern region and destroy it

OUTRO_NE_DIALOG_1.en: Fluctuation in the capacitor exceeding critical levels. The generator is going down! Run for your lives! It's gonna go boom!

OUTRO_NE_DIALOG_2.en: Fix your units and attack the weapon! Remember to use fire missions too!

OUTRO_NE_DIALOG_3.en: The shields matter little to us. The Weapon has ridiculous amounts of armor in it. You will never be able to destroy it!

NC_C2_DESC.en: The weapon consists of multiple, autonomous parts. Destroy them all!

NC_C2_OBJC_1_DESC.en: Destroy the Main Structure of the weapon

NC_C2_OBJC_4_DESC.en: Destroy the Close Area Reaction Unit

NC_MISSION_BAY_DESC.en: Destroy the Droid Bay's located in the front and rear of the weapon.

NC_DIALOG_BAY.en: MY beautiful Droids... Send in the Rocketeers!

NC_BAY_OBC_1_DESC.en: Destroy the Droid Bay facing West

NC_BAY_OBC_2_DESC.en: Destroy the Droid Bay facing East

OUTRO_NC_2_DIALOG1.en: Look at them run!  They are retreating further north!

OUTRO_NC_2_DIALOG3.en: Somehow I have this feeling that we'll be meeting Vile again soon...

PVP_TUTORIAL_RULES.en: The rules of the battlen\n\You play in turns and you have 3 actions per each turn. Possible actions are move, shoot or use a booster. Who kills all enemy units wins.

HELP_TEXT.en:
Crimson Empireâ€™s cowardly sneak attack caught us by surprise. Now itâ€™s time to gather the troops and strike back!

This guide will help you get started on your way to becoming a celebrated army commander.

1. Starting the Campaign: Missions
The best way to win back our lands is to carry out the missions. Tap the icon on the bottom left of the screen to expand the missions.

2. Energy
Lightning is the symbol for Energy. Monitor your energy closely. Moving units, attacking the enemy and collecting supplies from resource plots consume one Energy point each. Your energy will be replenished every few minutes.

3. Supplies
Supplies are your bread and butter in Army Attack!
Supplies are needed to repair both your units and defenses. The quantity of Supplies needed to repair a unit varies depending on the type of unit and how much health the unit has left.
Supplies are also a great source for earning Cash. The towns you have liberated need supplies. Part with some of your supplies, and they will give you cash. Just tap on the town and start the process.

3.1 Getting Supplies
Supplies are delivered on Drop Zones. Just place a Drop Zone on your game area, and then tap the Drop Zone to select the type of drop you want. Remember that the drops containing more Supplies also cost more cash and have longer delivery times.

3.2 Storage of your supplies
Bear in mind that there is a cap on the quantity of Supplies you can store. To raise this level you have to build storage structures found in the Shop under the Supplies tab.

4. Cash
You'll need cash when youâ€™re looking to buy new buildings, units or other cool stuff from the Shop; and sometimes a lot of it!
Get cash by destroying enemy units and structures.
Another good source of Cash is the liberated towns. Check out how to make the towns work for you in the Supplies part of this guide.

5. Buildings
Building a powerful base with a wide variety of buildings is one of the key steps toward reconquering our lands.
The buildings have two main purposes. First, buildings allow you to train units. This means that every time you build a new building, youâ€™ll get your hands on a new unit type. Second, each building raises the unit cap, meaning that the more buildings you have, the more units you can command.
To complete the construction of a building, the player needs specific building items. You can sometimes find these items by destroying enemy units.

6. Defenses
Defenses help you to control your area. Defensive structures fire on the enemy when it enters the structureâ€™s defensive parameter. Tap the defensive building to see the extent of the defensive parameter.
Be sure to repair the defensive buildings when they sustain damage. You can do this in the same way as you repair/heal your units.

7. Attacking
To attack an enemy unit, you must first move to a location that is within striking distance from that enemy unit.
When attacking enemy units, it is important to take advantage of the multiple attack opportunity. To do this, you need to move two or more units to within striking distance from the enemy before attacking. This way, all of your units within striking distance will fire when you engage the enemy.
